postTitle: Preconstruction Design Phase Manager I- Solar
jobTitle: Preconstruction Design Phase Manager I- Solar
descContent:
**Description**  

Mortenson is seeking an experienced **Design Phase Manager I** (DPM) to join
our Solar group who can interact with staff at all levels, remain flexible,
resourceful, proactive, and efficient in a dynamic environment, anticipate and
solve problems creatively, and ensure the owner’s vision is translated into
design solutions and construction parameters, while demonstrating excellent
communication skills and attention to detail, and potentially managing two
projects simultaneously or one larger project.

As a DPM, you'll use your utility scale solar experience to actively engage
with a variety of stakeholders (EORs, clients, internal team members) to
manage the design process. You'll skillfully guide and facilitate
conversations ensuring alignment between all parties while connecting the dots
across technical and financial domains. You see the bigger picture but can
also work through contract details and analyze risk. You're a project manager
at heart who wants to get in at the ground level, at the front-end of
construction. Design impactful projects from the ground up.

**Location:** Any home base location in the United States; preference given to
those that can work from our MN-HQ or any regional office

**Travel:** flexible; varies based on project locations

**RESPONSIBILITIES**

  * Manage the design process and work closely with customers/owners to define project expectations

  * Facilitate solicitation, selection, and contracting with designers for design-build projects

  * Develop and present project proposals

  * Create detailed project design phase and baseline construction schedules

  * Conduct detailed construction planning, including subcontractor selections and site utilization

  * Lead design team in incorporating constructability, logistics, and customer expectations

  * Guide estimating team in developing technical design aspects and cost documentation

  * Manage design phase costs, including estimates, value engineering, and budget management

  * Ensure regulatory approvals and risk management requirements are met

  * Oversee and mentor design phase team members, providing resources and support

  * Conduct performance evaluations and participate in hiring decisions

  * Model exceptional customer relations and gather feedback during the design process

  * Manage site work and logistics efficiently, providing improvement suggestions

  * Perform other duties as assigned

**QUALIFICATIONS**

  * Bachelor’s degree in Construction, Civil, or Architectural Engineering, Construction Management, Estimating, or equivalent field 

  * Minimum of six years relevant experience

  * Utility scale solar experience highly preferred 

  * Strong teamwork orientation, initiative, communication, problem-solving, and leadership skills

  * Detail orientation sufficient to organize and manage multiple project tasks

  * Possess basic understanding of construction law and generally accepted business practices

  * Microsoft Office, project, and pertinent web application skills at an intermediate level

  * Proven positive and professional attitude, and strong customer service skills

  * Ability to interpret and communicate Mortenson policies 

  * Ability to travel up to 50%

**A few benefits offered include:**

 _(for Non-Craft & Non-Union Craft working 25+ hours / week)_

  * Medical and prescription drug plans that includes no additional cost vision coverage 

  * Dental plan 

  * 401k retirement plan with a generous Mortenson match 

  * Paid time off, holidays, and other paid leaves 

  * Employer paid Life, AD&D, and disability insurance 

  * No-Cost mental health tool and concierge with extensive work-life resources

  * Tuition reimbursement 

  * Adoption Assistance 

  * Gym Membership Discount Program 

**The base pay range for this role is $110,700 - $166,100.** (Actual range is
higher for the following office locations: Denver, CO and Chicago, IL – 5%,
Seattle, WA, and Portland, OR – 10%, Washington, D.C. – 12.5%).

Base pay is positioned within the range based on several factors including an
individual’s knowledge, skills, and experience, with consideration given to
internal equity. This position is eligible for Mortenson’s incentive plan.

**#LI-GL1 #LI-remote**

**Please make note:**

  * Visa sponsorship is not offered for this position. 

  * Our postings are typically open a minimum of 5 days and an average of 44 days. 

**ABOUT MORTENSON**

As a top builder, developer, and EPC (Engineering, Procurement, and
Construction), our expertise spans markets like sports, renewable energy, data
centers, healthcare, and more. We are builders at heart, working to ensure the
built environment has a lasting positive impact.

Let’s Redefine Possible®

**Equal Employment Opportunity**

Your uniqueness brings new and creative perspectives to the team. Mortenson is
committed to providing equal opportunities of employment (EOE) to all
individuals, regardless of your race, religion, gender, national origin, age,
veteran status, disability, marital status or any other legally protected
category.

**Other Items to Note**

  * Mortenson reserves the right to hire any individual without legal or financial obligation on unwanted solicitations.  _No agency emails, calls, or solicitations are accepted_ without a valid agreement.

  * Must be currently legally authorized to work in the U.S. without sponsorship for employment visa status (e.g., H1B status, 0-1, TN, CPT, OPT, etc.). We are unable to sponsor or take over sponsorship of an employment Visa at this time.

  
  

* * *
jobCategory: 项目管理,咨询

postTitle: 兼职招聘】资深前端工程师（Vue 3.4 + Uniapp / 医药商城项目）
descContent:
🌟 项目简介

本项目为一个已上线的医药类商城（H5+小程序），目前处于功能迭代与体验优化阶段。项目采用最新的前端技术栈，追求性能与最大化的移动端适配。

🛠️技术栈要求

核心框架：掌握掌握Vue 3.4+ (必须精通Composition API)及Uniapp体系。

工程化：熟悉Vite配置、组件化开发及性能优化。

环境便利：具有多余的微信内置浏览器(WebView)及iOS Safari兼容性处理经验。

工具：熟练使用 Git（我们将提供私有 Gitea 仓库进行协作）。

🎯你需要解决的核心痛点（请阅读后再申请）

微信环境疑难杂症：解决H5/小程序运行正常，但在微信内置浏览器下，购物车、订单确认页、个人中心由于回调授权或JS-SDK签名导致无法打开/卡死的问题。

全面屏车辆：深度优化iOS Safari顶栏（刘海/灵动岛）及底栏（Home Indicator）的安全区域车辆（Safe Area），去除背景断层与点击桌面。

交互优化：修复吸底组件在移动端键盘弹出、地址栏动态伸缩时的视觉错位问题。
jobCategory: 前端开发

postTitle: 【兼职AI应用（视觉情绪识别及管理）工程师招聘】
descContent:
【兼职AI应用工程师招聘】
我们正在开发一款面向青少年的情绪管理APP，核心是通过表情识别捕捉用户情绪，结合豆包大模型提供心理引导，初期会优先用于帮助有抽动症、抑郁症等情况的孩子调节情绪。
一、招聘岗位：AI应用工程师（兼职）
工作地点：远程
招聘人数：1-2名
工作周期：2个月（2026年2月-3月），需在3月底前完成APP基础版本开发调试。
二、岗位职责：
 
负责接入火山引擎豆包视觉大模型API，实现实时表情识别功能，需能准确识别开心、焦虑、烦躁等8种以上情绪。
完成表情识别模块与APP前端的对接，确保从摄像头采集画面到情绪结果输出的延迟低于1秒。
调用豆包大模型API，根据识别出的情绪生成适合青少年的引导话术，需支持话术的个性化调整。
优化API调用逻辑，避免重复请求，确保免费额度内可满足日常测试及初期100人以内使用。
三、任职要求：
基本要求：
大专及以上学历，计算机或相关专业，有1年以上Python开发经验。
熟悉HTTP/HTTPS协议，能独立完成API接口的调用、调试和异常处理。
有火山引擎、阿里云等大模型API接入经验，了解表情识别或计算机视觉基础概念。
优先条件：
有过心理类或教育类APP开发经验者优先。
了解青少年心理特点，或有相关产品适配经验者优先。
四、薪酬福利：
薪资：项目总费用5-8万，分三期支付，完成API对接、功能联调、上线测试各支付一期。
福利：可提供项目成果署名，后续若项目推进顺利，可优先转为全职或长期合作。
五、应聘方式：
请将个人简历（含相关项目案例，尤其是API接入案例）发送至邮箱。
邮件主题请注明“AI应用工程师+姓名+可到岗时间”，附件命名同主题。
筛选通过后，会在3个工作日内联系进行技术面试，主要沟通API接入方案和项目时间规划。
发布日期：2026年1月2日
有效期至：2026年1月20日
jobCategory: AI,算法,客户端开发,全栈开发

Software Engineer Bootcamp.**

applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this
and instantly see they're human.

$40,000 — $120,000/year

postTitle: Senior Python Developer
descContent:
We’re looking for a developer who **prefers solving open problems over
following strict specs** , and who enjoys shipping meaningful work fast.

Become part of OTGS and work with senior engineers, influencing architecture,
and delivering systems that Support, Marketing, and VIP rely on.

**Why Join Us?**

  * **Trusted & Profitable:** Since 2008, OTGS has grown into a self-funded and stable company supporting over 1.5 million websites worldwide.
  * **Remote-first:** Join a diverse team of smart and friendly people working from all corners of the world.
  * **Creators of WPML:** You'll contribute to the #1 multilingual plugin for WordPress, used by hundreds of thousands of happy clients every day.
  * **Real Impact:** Your work will directly improve the experience of users around the globe.
  * **Growth-friendly:** We support your personal and professional development through mentorship, learning tools, and internal opportunities.
  * **Wellbeing focused:** We offer great benefits to help you thrive both in and out of work.

**Indicators You're a Great Fit**

  * You are an experienced developer with **strong Python skills.**
  * Believe in **writing tests** and clean, reliable code.
  * Open **to using AI in your daily work**.

**What You'll Do**

You’ll own high-level goals, shape them into real systems, and get them into
production quickly.

**If you want ownership, deep engineering work, and the chance to build
systems that move things forward, apply today, and we’d love to meet you.**

* * *
jobCategory: 后端开发,DevOps/MLOps

postTitle: [志愿搬运/远程全职]游戏外设/硬件产品经理招聘
jobTitle: 游戏外设/硬件产品经理
descContent:
⚠️ \* 此信息是社区志愿者的友情搬运转发，旨在帮助大家获得更多的工作机会。联系方式皆保留，有意可自行联系，也请说明来自“电鸭社区”。

*   信息的真实性、实效性需要大家自行识别判断，社区和搬运志愿者无法为此做出负责，请理解。
# 
我们是谁：
飞智，专注打造产品竞争力的游戏外设品牌。飞智核心团队来自复旦大学，有一批深具游戏情怀的小伙伴，坚持技术和设计创新，具有极度开放和不断成长的公司文化，期待与更多优秀的小伙伴共同成长。
我们在寻找充满激情与创造力的硬件产品经理，如果你既是产品打造高手，又是资深游戏玩家、电子发烧友，渴望用硬核技术重新定义游戏体验——这里就是你实现梦想的舞台！

你将主导这些酷炫挑战：
1. 洞察未来战场，深挖全球游戏外设市场趋势，分析玩家行为与需求，捕捉创新机会；
2. 定义新产品，为产品竞争力负责，实现商业成功；
3. 主导整机产品从概念设计到量产的完整闭环，主导跨部门作战与攻关，整合研发与供应链资源；
4. 负责产品全生命周期管理，产品生命周期替代计划。

职位要求：
我们期待这样的超级队友：
1. 全日制本科及以上学历，电子/机械/工业设计相关专业优先；
2. 3年+消费电子硬件产品经验，成功打造过爆款者优先；
3. 具备优秀的市场价值洞察能力，体验设计能力，资源整合能力，能够快速响应变化，积极解决问题；
4. 加分Buff：资深游戏玩家、电子产品发烧友、拆机能手、科技趋势雷达

我们的优势：
1. 国内游戏外设赛道市占率Top1
2. 公司近三年销售规模平均增速30%以上，稳定持续增长
3. 五天七小时工作制，弹性工作，没有加班文化
4. 丰富的培训和成长机会，定期组织外部培训和国内外参展
5. 扁平化管理，简单、开放、平等的人际关系
6. 员工利润共享，一年两次晋升和调薪的机会

HR联系方式：18682128204（微信同号）
jobCategory: 产品经理,项目管理

postTitle: Media Specialist – Google & Facebook
descContent:
We are looking for a skilled Paid Media Specialist to oversee, optimize, and
scale advertising campaigns across Facebook and Google platforms.

Key Responsibilities

Plan, execute, and continuously optimize Facebook and Google Ads campaigns

Track daily campaign performance and transform data into actionable insights

Optimize budgets, bidding strategies, audiences, and targeting to improve CPC,
CPA, CTR, and ROAS

Test, analyze, and iterate ad creatives, audiences, and landing pages to scale
top-performing campaigns

Collaborate closely with design, content, and sales teams to ensure aligned
and effective marketing strategies

Stay informed about platform updates, industry trends, and emerging paid media
opportunities

What Will Make You Stand Out

A background in Marketing, Advertising, Communications, or a related field

Minimum of 3 years of hands-on experience managing Facebook Ads and Google Ads
campaigns

Strong understanding of Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and conversion
tracking

Data-driven, detail-oriented, and highly organized

Excellent communication skills with the ability to handle multiple projects at
the same time

What We Offer

A collaborative and supportive working environment

Freedom to test new ideas, experiment with strategies, and continuously
optimize performance

Fully remote work with flexible working hours

Opportunities to work on impactful projects with brands across diverse
industries

How to Apply

Please send your CV to: hr@dsocialglobal.com

* * *
jobCategory: 市场营销,运营,数据分析,用户增长

**你好，未来的技术联创伙伴：**

我是“牧牧向导”的创始人。我们已上线的小程序，并非从零开始的幻想，而是一个**已验商业模式、亟待技术重构与激活的“半成品”**。我们已完成最复杂的商业逻辑梳理，现在，只差一位技术掌舵人，将它变为一台高效、可信的生态引擎。

我们寻找的不是执行者，而是能**理解商业本质、用代码构建规则、并愿与我们共享未来的技术合伙人**。如果你渴望一个深度绑定、全程参与、并用技术直接定义产品走向的机会，这封信正是为你而写。

**�� 这是一次怎样的合作？**

这是一份 **“技术联合创始人”级别的邀约**。我们以极简现金启动，用股权绑定长期利益，并将产品的技术未来托付于你。

**回报构成**

**具体说明**

**现金保障**

**首期****6****,000元人民币**，作为第一阶段核心开发工作的直接报酬，按里程碑支付，保障启动无忧。

**股权绑定**

**5%的公司注册股权**，通过正式《股权授予协议》锁定，分4年成熟。你不是临时工，而是公司的共同拥有者。

**未来主导权**

项目验证成功后，App及所有重大版本迭代由你**优先主导并签约实施**。你是平台技术蓝图的绘制者与建造者。

**�� 第一阶段核心任务：重构“经济系统”与体验（4-6周）**

本次开发将严格围绕 **《牧牧向导平台分账结算与运营优化方案》** 执行。这不仅是界面优化，更是对平台底层经济逻辑的系统性重构。优先级如下：

**P0 优先级：构建可信的“经济心脏”与合规基石**

这是本次开发的重中之重，是平台能否激活的关键。

**模块**

**核心开发内容**

**商业目标**

**1\. 分账规则引擎**

开发可配置的分账规则中心，同时支持 **“向导服务费”** 与 **“产品分销佣金”** 两套独立逻辑。这是平台的经济规则大脑。

固化商业模型，确保每一笔收入都能被清晰、自动地拆分给各方（向导、服务商、经纪人、平台）。

**2\. 向导钱包与结算**

重构钱包为 **纯现金账户**，集成收入分类（服务费/佣金）、**自动税务计算与代扣**、清晰提现流程。

让向导对收入绝对信任，实现合规化运营，规避核心财务风险。

**3\. 城市服务商结算模块**

开发自动计算 **“城市月度净收入”** 的引擎，并生成可在线确认、可打印的标准化《结算单》，支撑 **“三七分成”** 合作模式。

建立与城市合伙人的信任基石，实现复杂合伙分成的自动化、透明化。

**4\. 合规与审计接口**

构建监管数据上报接口与全量订单分账数据存证体系，确保资金流清晰、可追溯、可审计。

满足长期合规要求，为规模化作准备。

**P1 优先级：提升流量转化与核心体验**

在可靠的经济系统之上，优化用户获取与转化的关键界面。

**模块**

**核心开发内容**

**商业目标**

**旅游首页重构**

重构信息架构与视觉，强化搜索、目的地推荐与核心价值传达。

降低用户决策成本，提升首页到列表页的转化率。

**向导主页优化**

重塑信息展示（服务、评价、信任标签），优化编辑流程。

提升向导个人品牌，增强用户信任，提高详页到咨询的转化。

**P2 优先级：培育生态与运营提效**

丰富平台生态，赋能合作伙伴。

**模块**

**核心开发内容**

**商业目标**

**社区模块优化**

重构社区首页与互动形式，支持城市达人发布“微线路”等内容。

提升用户粘性与活跃度，构建内容生态。

**商家/服务商后台**

优化服务商子后台，提供数据看板、结算单确认、简易产品发布模板。

提升本地合作伙伴的运营效率和体验。

**P3 优先级：个人化体验完善**

**模块**

**核心开发内容**

**“我的”模块重构**

整合订单、钱包、资料管理，提升用户管理个人资产的效率与体验。

**�� 我们希望你具备怎样的特质？**

· **全栈能力与系统架构思维**：能熟练驾驭小程序前后端，并对设计交易、分账、多角色权限的**复杂业务系统**有浓厚兴趣或实战经验。

· **深刻的产品与商业理解力**：你能读懂“三七分成”背后的商业意图，而不仅仅将其视为一个功能。你的代码是在构建规则，而不仅仅是实现界面。

· **创业者的担当与节奏感**：能主动推进，对交付结果负责，能在远程协作中保持高效、透明的沟通。

· **一份技术人的纯粹与热忱**：你相信技术可以重塑商业，并愿意亲手参与这个过程。

**�� 为什么这个机会与众不同？**

1. **核心价值明确**：你无需从0到1猜测商业模式。我们将最复杂的**商业逻辑与分账模型**已完全梳理清晰，你挑战的是用最佳技术方案实现它。

2. **低风险，高绑定，高成长**：用一个月时间和基础保障，换取一个真实公司的股权，并锁定未来技术主导权。你的代码将直接决定平台的效率和扩展性。

3. **路径清晰，一步一印**：从小程序“经济系统”重构，到App全面升级，你的每一个决策都至关重要，成长轨迹清晰可见。

**�� 如何开启这次并肩作战的对话？**

如果你已被“构建平台经济系统”的挑战所吸引，并准备好以技术合伙人的身份承担重任，请通过以下方式联系我们。

**请在来信中，帮助我们更好地了解你：**

1. 一段简短的自述：你对“技术合伙人”角色的理解，以及为何对此机会感兴趣。

2. 1-2个最能体现你**技术深度**与**业务理解力**的项目经历（附链接或简述）。

3. （强力加分项）你对“牧牧向导”**分账结算系统**或**向导钱包体验**的任何初步思考或技术实现设想。

**我们寻找的，是一位能共同定义未来的创始团队成员。**  
**期待与你，从重构经济系统的第一行代码开始。**
jobCategory: 全栈开发,后端开发,产品经理,运营,项目管理

postTitle: Senior Full-Stack TypeScript Engineer (NestJS + React) – SaaS Platform
jobTitle: Senior Full-Stack TypeScript Engineer (NestJS + React) – SaaS Platform
descContent:
Enrollio is a fast-growing SaaS platform serving children’s dance and
performing arts studios. We are rebuilding and scaling our core systems and
are hiring a Senior Full-Stack TypeScript Engineer who can own major parts of
our NestJS + React monorepo.

This is a long-term, full-time role. We’re looking for someone who thinks like
a product engineer—not a task-taker. Someone who cares about reliability,
clean architecture, debugging deep issues, and building scalable systems.

* * *

## **What You’ll Work On**

  * Fix high-priority bugs across our parent portal, studio portal, and backend

  * Own reliability of enrollment + payment flows (Stripe PaymentIntents + Elements)

  * Build and improve NestJS REST APIs and module architecture

  * Improve backend stability, error handling, and logging

  * Refactor legacy features for performance and long-term maintainability

  * Implement UI improvements across React, Vite, Zustand, TanStack Query

  * Work inside a TypeScript monorepo (backend + studio portal + parent portal)

  * Collaborate with support/ops when urgent issues arise

  * Assist with our ongoing backend restructure and migration

  * Be available during EST working hours (with flexibility for emergencies)

* * *

## **Our Tech Stack**

**Backend:** NestJS, TypeScript, MongoDB Atlas, Redis (BullMQ), Stripe,
GoHighLevel API, Mailgun, SendGrid, Brevo, Google Cloud (App Engine, Cloud
Build), Jest, Sentry  
**Frontend:** React 18, Vite, TypeScript, Zustand, TanStack Query, Tailwind,
Radix UI, shadcn/ui, Framer Motion  
**Architecture:** Monorepo, domain-driven, fully typed, reliability-focused

* * *

## **Must-Have Experience**

  * 5+ years full-stack engineering

  * Strong TypeScript across backend + frontend

  * Deep experience with NestJS and React

  * Experience with Stripe PaymentIntents + subscription billing flows

  * Production MongoDB experience

  * Ability to debug complex issues across multiple layers

  * Strong English communication

  * Ownership mindset; reliable and proactive

* * *

## **Bonus Experience (Not required but valuable)**

  * BullMQ or similar queue systems

  * GoHighLevel API

  * MongoDB performance tuning

  * GCP deployments

  * Sentry, logging, observability

  * Stabilizing or refactoring large SaaS architectures

  * Understanding race conditions, idempotency, concurrency issues

* * *

## **What We Offer**

  * Long-term, stable role (40 hours/week)

  * Direct work with the founder + ops team

  * Remote, flexible schedule with PH overlap

  * Competitive salary

  * Opportunities to grow into Lead/Senior roles

  * A chance to own major parts of a platform used by hundreds of businesses

* * *

## **How to Apply**

Send us:

  1. A brief intro

  2. Resume or LinkedIn

  3. GitHub or code samples

  4. A short explanation of a difficult bug you fixed

  5. Experience with NestJS, React, and Stripe

  6. Expected monthly salary

  7. Availability to start

Email: **brad@enrollio.ai**  
Subject: **Senior Full-Stack Engineer – Enrollio**

* * *
jobCategory: 全栈开发,后端开发,前端开发,DevOps/MLOps,技术支持

postTitle: Remote Inside Sales
descContent:
Account Executive - Inside Sales  
**About US  
  
** We are a financial services start up focusing on helping US consumers
improve their credit.  
  
Here you can feel good about helping people while working from home and
earning a generous commission package.  
  
We offer a $1,000 USD training draw for your first month, no lead costs, and
tons of growth opportunity.  
  
If you are a seasoned Sales Professional with near native English language
proficiency, we want to hear from you!**  
**  
**Compensation  
  
** This is a 100% commission role (draw or commission, whichever is higher)  
  
OTE (first year) for top reps is $4,500/Month  
  
Average OTE (first year) is $3,000/Month**  
  
**  
**What will you be doing?  
  
** Help inbound callers understand their credit situation and provide
consultations with the goal of enrolling them in one of our services should
they be a good fit.  
**  
What will make you successful?**  
  
You will be directly compensated for your ability to help meet business
targets: daily KPI goals, clients assisted, and revenue collected.  
  
Goal Oriented – self-starters who can meet and exceed sales goals  
  
Learners – always looking to improve and grow  
  
Tech savvy – able to navigate digital tools

* * *
jobCategory: 销售,金融,客户服务,咨询

postTitle: 【硬核兼】全栈能力，嵌入工程师，音视频底层 + Gemini Live API 多模态打样 (POV 视觉方向)
jobTitle: 全栈开发工程师（嵌入式+AI方向）
descContent:
【核心任务】

硬件调通：实现 App 稳定调取外置 UVC 摄像头流。

AI 集成：对接 Google Gemini Multimodal Live API (WebSocket)，实现实时视频帧发送与语音回传。

屏幕联动：利用 MediaProjection 权限抓取手机屏幕（如导航/订单界面），实现“外部视角+手机内部屏幕”双流识别。

后台运行：确保在手机锁屏或切换到第三方 App 时，AI 语音交互不断线。

【对你的期待】

精通 Android ios原生开发，有处理 UVC 驱动或 Camera2 接口的实战经验。

熟悉音视频推流（WebRTC/WebSocket）及图像压缩处理。

对大模型 API 接入有经验者优先。

能够接受“快速迭代、小步快跑”的打样逻辑，UI 只要能用就行，重点在底层逻辑稳定性。

【合作方式】

性质：远程兼职，项目制交付。

周期：预计 1-2 周内跑通 MVP 流程。

预算：专项协调，如全栈¥8000 - ¥12000（根据实现质量和进度可谈，支持阶段性分批支付）。
jobCategory: 全栈开发,客户端开发,AI,算法,DevOps/MLOps

postTitle: Amazon & Walmart PPC Advertising – Account Manager
jobTitle: Amazon & Walmart PPC Advertising – Account Manager
descContent:
[Amazowl](https://www.amazowl.com) is a global Amazon & marketplace eCommerce
agency.  
  

We’re seeking an experienced **Amazon & Walmart PPC Advertising Account
Manager** to manage multiple client brands on Amazon/Walmart.  
  

Extensive experience of Amazon PPC is required – and any PPC experience of
other eCommerce marketplaces is an added bonus (Walmart, Target, Instacart).  
  

**You’ll be responsible for**

  * Managing & measuring the success of each of your PPC client brands on Amazon
  * Maintaining excellent client communication via both Slack & team calls

  
In return, we offer a fully remote working environment & extremely flexible
working hours to help you achieve a work-life balance.  
  

**IMPORTANT – Please include your answers to the following questions in your
application**

  * Where are you physically located? (Can be anywhere)
  * What is your approximate rate, per month in USD, for a full-time contract?
  * Please detail your Amazon/Walmart PPC advertising experience
  * Do you have experience working in an agency environment?

* * *

postTitle: 【兼职顾问】高级RAG算法专家/架构师
descContent:
我们目前正在研发一款面向律师群体的“AI知识库”产品（类法律网盘+RAG问答）。 内部技术团队为 Java 背景（Spring AI + Spring Alibaba + Elasticsearch），AI 落地经验尚浅。项目处于从 0 到 1 的关键架构设计与 MVP 落地阶段。
----------
【我们需要您做什么】 
1，您可以写代码，也可以不写。
    可以不要求您全职写代码，而是需要您的经验与视野（每周 2-4 小时远程会议/文档评审）：
2，架构把关： 评审我们的 RAG 技术路径图（包括数据解析、切片策略、混合检索、重排序等环节），指出潜在坑点。
3，技术选型： 针对法律场景，推荐最合适的开源模型（如 Embedding/Rerank 模型选型）、工具链（如 PDF 解析工具、向量库配置）。
4，难点攻关： 针对“表格解析”、“长文本检索准确率低”、“引用溯源”等具体痛点提供成熟的解决思路。
5，团队指导： 协助内部 Java 团队理解 AI 工程化逻辑，指导 Prompt 优化策略。

【对您的要求】
1，硬性要求： 拥有搜索推荐或 NLP 算法落地经验，熟悉 LLM RAG 完整链路。
2，实战经验： 必须亲自落地过基于 LangChain/LlamaIndex/Spring AI 或自研框架的 RAG 项目，熟悉 Elasticsearch 混合检索、BGE/M3 等模型调优。
3，技术栈： 熟悉 Python AI 生态，若了解 Java/Spring AI 生态更佳（便于沟通）。
4，加分项： 有法律、金融或企业级知识库项目经验者优先。

【合作方式】
1，方式： 远程兼职、偶尔现场（均可），按时薪或月度顾问费结算。
2，周期： 预计 1-3 个月（视项目进展可长期）。
3，保密： 需保密
salary: 按时薪或月度顾问费结算
jobCategory: 算法,AI,咨询,DevOps/MLOps,项目管理

postTitle: 美团机票内容创作兼职--线上办公时间自由
jobTitle: 美团机票内容创作兼职
descContent:
工作内容
1. 基于美团机票特惠活动及旅行场景，创作小红书、抖音等平台的机票攻略、旅行干货、机票抢购技巧等内容；
2. 独立运营1-2个主流平台账号（小红书等），每月至少发布50篇内容，提升账号权重与活跃度；
3. 挖掘美团机票产品亮点（如低价机票、航线优惠、旅行套餐等），精准触达用户需求，提升内容转化效果。
岗位要求
1. 热爱旅行及机票攻略研究，有旅行类内容创作经验者优先，需提供至少1个个人运营的社交平台账号（小红书等）；
2. 熟悉小红书/抖音等平台流量规则，有爆款内容经验者加分；
3. 具备基础图片处理及视频剪辑能力，文案简洁有吸引力，能突出机票优惠及实用信息；
4. 每天可投入2小时以上，能稳定合作3个月及以上，有目标感、学习能力强。
工作方式
· 全程线上工作！时间地点灵活！不坐班！
· 多劳多得，按内容效果提供激励；
· 表现优异者可获美团官方实践证明，优秀者有机会转线下实习或长期合作！
欢迎带上你的账号/作品集，加入我们边玩边赚的团队！
jobCategory: 内容创作,市场营销,运营,视频剪辑

postTitle: 【远程/长期】视频剪辑（月薪5k+）
descContent:
💡 项目简介
我正在经营一个专注于宇宙/天文/硬核科普领域的自媒体频道。内容具有较高的视觉要求，旨在通过震撼的画面带观众探索星辰大海。目前需要寻找一位对宇宙充满好奇心、视觉表现力强的视频剪辑助理。

📌 工作内容
核心任务： 负责频道长视频的后期制作（视频长度通常在 5-15 分钟）。

协作模式： 我提供完整的文案剧本和录音音频；你负责素材搜集（影视/模拟动画/实拍）、画面剪辑、特效花字、BGM 适配及字幕。

更新节奏： 每周产出一期高质量视频。

✅ 岗位要求
审美过硬： 宇宙题材需要极强的画面表现力，要求能精准找素材，且画面调色、构图大气震撼。

工具熟练： 熟练使用 PR、AE（能做简单空间特效加分）、Final Cut 或剪映专业版。

逻辑感： 能理解天文科普文案，用画面精准匹配科学概念。

靠谱守时： 接受远程协作模式，不消失，按时交付。

💰 薪资待遇
固定月薪：5000 元/月（按每周一更计算）。

增长空间： 如果你能力非常突出、审美惊艳且合作愉快，薪资完全可以再商量，我也非常愿意为顶尖才华支付更高的报酬。

试剪说明： 筛选简历后，我会邀请候选人进行一段 1-2 分钟的付费试剪（试剪表现好直接入职）。

🚀 如何申请
请发送以下信息至 邮箱：

作品集： 请务必附上 1-2 个你最满意的长视频作品（如果有科普或视觉大片类作品优先）。

个人简介： 简单介绍你的剪辑经历和目前的可支配时间。

对宇宙题材的理解： 简单聊聊你对制作这类视频的视觉想法。谢谢！
jobCategory: 视频剪辑,内容创作,设计

postTitle: [志愿搬运/远程全职]高级产品经理（程序化广告平台）｜全职远程工作｜年薪 20–35k 美元
jobTitle: 高级产品经理（程序化广告平台）
descContent:
⚠️ \* 此信息是社区志愿者的友情搬运转发，旨在帮助大家获得更多的工作机会。联系方式皆保留，有意可自行联系，也请说明来自“电鸭社区”。

*   信息的真实性、实效性需要大家自行识别判断，社区和搬运志愿者无法为此做出负责，请理解。
# 
岗位内容：
1. 深入分析程序化广告市场趋势与技术动态（包括后 Cookie 解决方案、AI 应用等），持续跟踪竞争对手，制定清晰可执行的产品差异化战略；
2. 主导制定并持续优化产品中长期路线图，合理拆解阶段目标与功能优先级，确保产品演进与公司商业目标高度一致；
3. 【核心职责】从 0 到 1 挖掘、定义并交付平台关键功能需求，主导从产品概念、方案设计到开发上线的完整流程；
4. 重点负责智能优化引擎方向，包括但不限于 tCPA、tROAS、预算智能分配等下一代自动化出价与预算管理能力的规划与落地；
5. 与技术、算法、运营等团队密切协作，推动复杂产品能力稳定交付并持续迭代。

岗位要求：
1. 本科及以上学历，5 年以上互联网产品经验，其中至少 3 年深耕程序化广告产品领域；
2. 对程序化广告技术栈有深入理解，熟悉 RTB / OpenRTB 协议，以及广告投放、竞价、定向、归因、监测等全链路流程；
3. 具备优秀的产品规划与需求分析能力，有从 0 到 1 主导复杂广告产品功能成功上线的完整经验；
4. 数据驱动，逻辑清晰，具备较强的问题拆解与决策能力，能基于数据推动产品判断；
5. 具备优秀的沟通、协调与项目推进能力，能在跨团队、多角色环境中高效工作。

优先条件：
1. 有后 Cookie 时代身份解决方案经验（如一方数据平台、群体建模、上下文定向等）；
2. 有 AI 在广告领域的应用经验，如智能出价、智能预算、创意生成等；
3. 熟悉全球及国内程序化广告生态，对 Trade Desk、Google DV360、阿里 Uni Desk、腾讯广告等产品有实际理解；
4. 具备技术背景，能与研发及算法工程师进行深入技术沟通。

公司介绍：
我们是一家专注于广告技术与数据驱动增长的互联网团队，业务面向全球市场，致力于打造高性能、智能化的程序化广告平台。团队扁平高效，支持全远程协作，重视产品长期价值与技术壁垒建设。

联系方式：
upjw739（添加备注来意）
jobCategory: 产品经理,AI,市场营销,数据分析,项目管理

postTitle: Software Engineer: Platform Services at Supabase
jobTitle: Software Engineer: Platform Services at Supabase
descContent:
Supabase is the Postgres development platform, built by developers for
developers. We provide a complete backend solution including Database, Auth,
Storage, Edge Functions, Realtime, and Vector Search. All services are deeply
integrated and designed for growth.

### **About the Role**

We’re looking for a experienced software engineers to own the control plane
that operates the Supabase Cloud offering. This role is ideal for someone who
thrives in async, fast-paced environments and is excited about building
developer tools that scale to millions.

### What You'll Do

  * **Build and maintain the Supabase Control Plane** \- Own our **typescript** -based control plane services that manage the lifecycle of million of customer projects across the Supabase Cloud offering

  * **Architect cloud deployment and change management infrastructure** \- Design and implement robust patterns for deploying and maintaining cloud infrastructure at scale

  * **Ensure operational excellence** \- Identify reliability risks, push for automation; build monitoring, alerting, and diagnostic capabilities into the control plane

  * **Collaborate across teams** \- Work with database engineers, product teams, and SREs to deliver a seamless experience for the management of their products and services

### What We're Looking For

  * **Strong programming skills** \- Proficiency in**Typescript and Go** , familiarity with modern tooling (e.g. vitest, zod in ts, or sqlc in go)

  * **Data persistence -** Strong command of Postgres and relational database design, and experience with optimizing query performance.

  * **Production operations mindset** \- Track record of building reliable, observable, and maintainable systems in public-facing production environments.

  * **Ownership mindset** \- You thrive in being able to operate independently with high-level guidance

  * **Strong written communication** \- You write RFCs, keep runbooks current, and record decisions. You're good at identifying, capturing, and clearly explaining tradeoffs

### Nice to Have

  * Experience with building and operating cloud infrastructure using AWS SDKs and IaC tools

### **What We Offer**

  * **Fully Remote**

We hire globally. We believe you can do your best work from anywhere. There
are no Supabase offices, but we provide a WeWork membership or co-working
allowance you can use anywhere in the world.

  * **ESOP**

Every team member receives ESOP (equity ownership) in the company. We want
everyone to share in the upside of what we’re building together.

  * **Tech Allowance**

Use this budget to set up your ideal work environment—laptop, monitor,
headphones, or whatever helps you do your best work.

  * **Health Benefits**

Supabase covers 100% of health insurance for employees and 80% for dependents,
wherever you are. Your wellbeing and your family’s health are important to us.

  * **Annual Off-Sites**

Once a year, the entire company gathers in a new city for a week of
connection, collaboration, and fun. It’s a highlight of our year.

  * **Flexible Work**

We operate asynchronously and trust you to manage your own time. You know what
needs to be done and when.

  * **Professional Development**

Every team member receives an annual education allowance to spend on
learning—courses, books, conferences, or anything that supports your growth.

### **About the Team**

Supabase was born-remote and open-source-first. We believe our globally
distributed team is our secret weapon in building tools developers love.

  * 180+ team members

  * 40+ countries

  * 15+ languages spoken

  * $496M raised

  * 430,000+ community members

  * 30,000+ memes posted (and counting)

We move fast, build in public, and use what we ship. If it’s in your project,
we probably use it in ours too. We believe deeply in the open-source ecosystem
and strive to support—not replace—existing tools and communities.

### **Hiring Process**

We keep things simple, async-friendly, and respectful of your time:

  1. Apply – Our team will review your application.

  2. Intro Call – A short video chat to get to know each other.

  3. Interviews – Up to four calls with:

     * Founders

     * Future teammates

     * Someone cross-functional from product, growth, or engineering (depending on the role)

  4. Decision – We may follow up with a final question or go straight to offer.

All communication is remote and we aim to move fast.
jobCategory: 后端开发,DevOps/MLOps,运维,全栈开发

postTitle: Global Community Events Manager at Metabase
jobTitle: Global Community Events Manager at Metabase
descContent:
Metabase is the easiest way for people to get insights from their data, from
tiny startups who get up and running quickly to major corporations with tens
of thousands of users. That's why people [love
us](https://www.metabase.com/love).

  

We bring data tools with the elegance and simplicity of consumer products to
the crufty world of enterprise business intelligence. We provide an
opinionated open source starting point for how companies should measure,
analyze and share their data, which is used by tens of thousands of companies.

  

**The opportunity**

We’ve seen firsthand how powerful in-person community connection can be — from
our flagship **Meetabase** in Argentina to customer-hosted events in Madrid,
and casual bar meetups organized when team members travel through Europe.
We’re hiring someone to scale and grow this — to find new cities, book venues,
handle swag, logistics, food, shipping, all the details — so that our Success
Engineers can just show up, talk to customers, and build relationships. You’ll
be the person who turns a “we should do something in Berlin” idea into a real
event that brings dozens of people together.

**The opportunity**

We’ve seen firsthand how powerful in-person community connection can be — from
our flagship **Meetabase** in Argentina to customer-hosted events in Madrid,
and casual bar meetups organized when team members travel through Europe.
We’re hiring someone to scale and grow this — to find new cities, book venues,
handle swag, logistics, food, shipping, all the details — so that our Success
Engineers can just show up, talk to customers, and build relationships. You’ll
be the person who turns a “we should do something in Berlin” idea into a real
event that brings dozens of people together.

### What you’ll own / responsibilities

* Strategically identify target cities and regions for in-person gatherings (meetups, dinners, informal events) based on community density, product usage, and growth potential
* Lead all logistics: venue selection & negotiation, catering, AV, signage, swag, guest list, travel alignment, shipping, etc.
* Work with Metabase team members (engineering, success engineering, marketing) traveling internationally to piggyback casual meetups or visits
* Build standardized playbooks, checklists, and templates to scale and replicate events globally
* Manage budgets, vendor relationships, and procurement
* Coordinate with Marketing, Sales, and Success Engineering teams to ensure alignment on branding, messaging, funnel/handoff of leads from events
* Collect event feedback, metrics, and learnings; iterate to continuously improve quality, efficiency, and impact

### What you bring / qualifications

* Proven experience organizing events (virtual or in-person), field/community marketing, for tech companies
* Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail, and ability to manage multiple projects across time zones
* Strong vendor negotiation and contract familiarity
* Comfortable with international logistics: shipping swag, foreign vendors, cross-border payments
* Self-starter, autonomous, comfortable working in a remote, asynchronous environment
* Some ability for international travel. You won’t necessarily need to attend all of the events, but you’ll need the ability to go to them if you need to be there
* Strong written and verbal communication skills
* Bonus if you have experience in SaaS, data analytics tools, or open-source communities 
* Bonus if you speak multiple languages (e.g. Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, etc.)

###  Why this role matters

* This role is the behind-the-scenes engine for growing our global community in real life. Every event you run is a chance for us to deepen relationships, hear real feedback, win hearts, and generate new evangelists and leads. You’re building the bridge between our product + users in the physical world.

### What it’s like to work at Metabase

* Fully remote, global team. Work where and when you’re most productive
* You’ll contribute to software that empowers organizations to get insights from their data without needing a full analytics team
* We value transparency, community, and giving the user a voice — and this role is central to that
* You’ll be working alongside talented cross-functional teammates with lots of autonomy and growth opportunities
* This role will initially report to the VP of Success Engineering

**If there's anything more you'd like to tell us about you or your interests,
use the "additional information" section on the application page. We are real
humans looking at applications and we love to hear what you have to say!**

  

We're a global team (50% outside the US), fully distributed (from Thailand to
California), who get things done asynchronously, with plenty of uninterrupted
time, supporting each other to do the best work of our careers. We offer
flexibility (define your own schedule and work from wherever you want),
autonomy, and an environment that fosters growth, learning, and development.
We're relentlessly user-focused and believe in building long-term value, not
short-term hacks. And we raised a $30M Series B to take our approach to the
next level for years to come.

  

For U.S. applicants: Metabase participates in the federal E-Verify program,
which confirms employment authorization of newly hired U.S. based employees.
E-Verify is not used as a tool to pre-screen candidates and is only initiated
upon hire.

  

[E-Verify Participation
Notice](https://www.e-verify.gov/sites/default/files/everify/posters/EVerifyParticipationPoster.pdf)
(English/Spanish)

[Right to Work
Notice](https://www.e-verify.gov/sites/default/files/everify/posters/IER_RightToWorkPoster%20Eng_Es.pdf)
(English/Spanish)

Metabase is the easiest way for people to get insights from their data, from
tiny startups who get up and running quickly to major corporations with tens
of thousands of users. That's why people [love
us](https://www.metabase.com/love).

  

We bring data tools with the elegance and simplicity of consumer products to
the crufty world of enterprise business intelligence. We provide an
opinionated open source starting point for how companies should measure,
analyze and share their data, which is used by tens of thousands of companies.

postTitle: Projektový manažer/ka (m/w/d) (7)
descContent:
## Popis pracovní pozice

**xalution s.r.o., Praha**  

Hledáme odborníka, který bude hnací silou našeho partnerství s Microsoftem a
expertem na licencování produktů Microsoft Dynamics 365. Pokud máš vášeň pro
technologie Microsoft, jsi zkušený v oblasti licencování a máte zájem o práci
v dynamickém prostředí, kde můžeš využít své dovednosti při presales
aktivitách a získávání podpory od Microsoftu, pak je tato pozice právě pro
Tebe!  
  

**Jaké úkoly vás u nás čekají:**  

  * Správa a rozvoj vztahů s Microsoftem v rámci našeho partnerství D365.

  * Poradenství v oblasti licencování produktů Microsoft a řešení dotazů klientů.

  * Spolupráce s týmem prodeje při přípravě a realizaci presales aktivit.

  * Komunikace s Microsoftem ohledně podpory, zdrojů a aktualizací produktů.

  * Organizace a účast na workshopách, školeních a událostech spojených s produkty Microsoft.

  

**Proč se právě vy hodíte do našeho týmu:**  

  * Práci v dynamickém a inovativním prostředí.

  * Možnost ovlivnit a rozvíjet strategické partnerství s jedním z předních technologických gigantů.

  * Konkurenční plat a atraktivní balíček zaměstnaneckých benefitů.

  * Široké možnosti profesního růstu a vzdělávání.

## Požadavky pracovní pozice

**Jaký způsob myšlení byste si ideálně měli vzít s sebou:**  

  * Znalosti produktů Microsoft Dynamics 365 a zkušenosti s licencováním.

  * Silné komunikační dovednosti a schopnost budovat vztahy s partnery a klienty.

  * Zkušenosti s práci v týmu a schopnost efektivně koordinovat s různými odděleními.

  * Proaktivní přístup a schopnost samostatně řešit problémy.

  * Zkušenosti s presales procesy jsou výhodou.

**  
**

**O nás**

xalution není jen mladá a dynamická společnost - xalution je domovem vysoce
motivovaného a technicky vynikajícího mezinárodního týmu s mezioborovými
dovednostmi. Naši zaměstnanci v Německu, České republice, Polsku, na
Slovensku, v Rakousku a Švýcarsku poskytují poradenství známým společnostem z
oblasti sportovního a módního průmyslu, zdravotnictví a veřejného sektoru.  
  
Jako partner společnosti Microsoft nabízíme našim zákazníkům celou škálu
výkonných produktů Microsoft a souvisejících služeb. Od podpory již zavedených
softwarových řešení za provozu a jejich rozšíření až po zpracování kompletních
projektů včetně úprav softwaru na míru.  

**  
**

Připoj se k nám a dej své kariéře nový rozměr ve světě řízení projektů!
Přihlaste se prostřednictvím našeho webového formuláře
nebo**[e-mailem](mailto:karriere@xalution.com)**. **Další informace a postřehy
najdete na našich webových stránkách a
v[novinkách](https://www.xalution.com/de/news/)!**  

### Hotovo!

Vaše přihláška byla úspěšně odeslána!

postTitle: Work from Home Sales Opportunity
descContent:
**About New Freedom Financial**

New Freedom Financial is a family-driven, vision-first agency backed by a
major national carrier. We combine modern tech, AI-assisted systems, and human
connection to change how families protect their future. Our mission is simple:
serve people and leave them better than we found them.

**Why this role is different**

This isn’t a corporate seat — it’s a pathway to ownership. You’ll build your
own business & develop a book of business, lead a team, and scale your income
based on performance. No cold calls. No chasing. You’ll work warm, qualified
clients who’ve already requested help.

**What you’ll do**

  * Master our systems and product suite to deliver first-class client experiences.
  * Follow up with warm leads and prior client inquiries (we provide high-quality leads).
  * Meet clients virtually (Zoom / phone) and guide them through the protections that build generational wealth.
  * Manage your client communication and relationship lifecycle.
  * Build a personal brand and scale your book — recruit and lead a team when ready.
  * Hit performance goals to unlock promotions, leadership roles, and revenue-share opportunities.
  * Maintain licensing, contracting, and compliance for your market.
  * Attend weekly virtual training and leadership development.

**Requirements**

  * Reliable phone, data, and Wi-Fi.
  * Must pass background check and carrier contracting.
  * Active Life & Health license, or willingness to get licensed (we’ll help you in 7–10 days).

**Who you are**

  * You want to build and own something — not just collect a paycheck.
  * Entrepreneurial mindset: you plan, execute, iterate, and refuse to be average.
  * Strong communicator — phone and video-first comfort.
  * Organized, self-motivated, and tech-savvy.
  * Preferably 2+ years in sales, service, or business ownership — but grit and results matter more.

### Benefits

**Compensation & growth**

  * Uncapped commission structure + performance bonuses and incentives.
  * Clear path to leadership / territory ownership / revenue-share for top performers.
  * Many of our highest-performing partners create a significant, scalable income by building teams and recurring revenue streams.
  * 100% Commission
  * **Perks**
  * Remote, flexible schedule (evenings/weekends as client needs require).
  * Comprehensive training and a proven playbook to build your business.
  * Annual all-expense-paid trips for top producers.
  * Discounted health and life coverage options.
  * Leadership development and agent-to-owner transition support.

* * *
jobCategory: 销售,金融,客户服务

postTitle: Database Engineer
descContent:
##  Overview

Are you ready to make a difference in the world of consumer finance?  
  
At Attain Finance, we bring over 50 years of expertise in providing credit
solutions across the U.S. and Canada. Our deep roots in the financial industry
have empowered us to develop convenient, easily accessible financial services
that meet our customers' growing needs.

We are seeking a skilled **Database Reliability Engineer (DBRE)** to own the
reliability, performance, monitoring, and security of our database ecosystem
across **AWS RDS, Aurora, PostgreSQL, and SQL Server**. This role plays a
critical part in ensuring production stability, improving database operations,
strengthening governance, and supporting our shift toward **real-time
ingestion and a modern Data Cloud platform**.

You will work closely with Data Engineering, Software Engineering, InfoSec,
and Data Governance teams to streamline database operations, improve
observability, and maintain a secure, compliant environment. The ideal
candidate enjoys solving complex production issues, optimizing systems, and
building long-lasting, scalable database practices.

##  Responsibilities

**Database Reliability, Monitoring & Performance**

  * Manage and optimize databases across **AWS RDS, Aurora (MySQL/Postgres), PostgreSQL** , and **Microsoft SQL Server**.

  * Build and enhance **monitoring and alerting** for availability, performance, replication lag, storage, and system anomalies using CloudWatch, Datadog, or similar tools.

  * Ensure database **performance tuning** , **capacity planning** , **HA/DR readiness** , and operational excellence.

  * Proactively track database health and address performance or stability issues before they impact production.

  * Lead backup, recovery, retention, and failover strategies.

**Production Support & Incident Response**

  * Act as a key responder for **critical production database incidents**, ensuring fast diagnosis and resolution.

  * Conduct root cause analysis (RCA) and implement long-term preventive improvements.

  * Improve response playbooks, runbooks, dashboards, and observability practices.

**Security, Access Cleanup & Governance**

  * Lead efforts to **standardize and clean up database access** , aligning permissions with least-privilege and governance standards.

  * Work with Data Governance and InfoSec to ensure compliance, auditing, encryption, and secure access patterns.

  * Maintain consistent operational and security practices across all environments.

**Collaboration & Platform Modernization**

  * Partner with the **Data Engineering** team to support modern pipelines, schema design improvements, and real-time ingestion architectures.

  * Provide guidance on query optimization, SQL reviews, and data model considerations.

  * Support the evolution of our data platform, including**real-time ingestion** (CDC, Kafka, Kinesis, etc.).

**Continuous Improvement & Automation**

  * Identify opportunities to automate manual processes, improve monitoring tools, and streamline operations.

  * Maintain documentation, runbooks, and best practices to improve reliability and cross-team collaboration.

  * Contribute to tooling improvements that elevate database visibility and performance

##  Qualifications

**Required Qualifications**

  * 3-5 years in a database-focused engineering or reliability role.

  * Strong hands-on expertise with:

  * **AWS RDS & Aurora (Postgres/MySQL)**

  * **PostgreSQL administration & tuning**

  * **SQL Server administration**

  * Strong understanding of:

  * Performance tuning and diagnostics

  * High availability, replication, DR, and failover mechanisms

  * Backup/restore operations

  * IAM, access control, encryption, and auditability

  * Monitoring and observability best practices

  * Experience supporting **mission-critical production databases**.

  * Strong troubleshooting skills and ability to communicate effectively under pressure.

  * Comfortable partnering with **data engineering** teams.

**Preferred Qualifications**

  * Experience with **Snowflake** or interest in supporting its adoption.

  * Exposure to **real-time ingestion** (Kafka, Kinesis, CDC, DMS).

  * Familiarity with infrastructure-as-code (Terraform, CloudFormation).

  * Experience with observability tools (CloudWatch, Datadog, Grafana, New Relic).

**What We’re Looking For**

A proactive, detail-oriented engineer who thrives in fast-paced environments,
prioritizes reliability and monitoring excellence, and enjoys collaborating to
build a secure, scalable, and modern data platform.

**Base Salary:** $90,000 - $110,000 USD

The base salary range represents the low and high end of the anticipated
salary range for this position based on the U.S. average. The actual base
salary offered for this full-time position will be determined by various
factors, including but not limited to, location, skills, knowledge,
competencies, and experience.  
  
All full-time salaried employees are eligible for the following benefits,
starting on day one: Flexible Paid Time Off Program, Medical, Dental, Vision,
Life Insurance, Disability, and other voluntary coverages. You will also be
eligible to participate in our 401k program, starting on the first of the
month following 30 days of employment with a company match.  
  
This employer participates in E-Verify for US-based hires.  
  
#AttainFinance #ATTAINRP

##  EEO Statement

Attain Finance Supports Equal Employment Opportunity. CURO (dba Cash Money®,
LendDirect®, Heights Finance, Southern Finance, Covington Credit, Quick
Credit, and First Heritage Credit) is committed to a policy of providing equal
employment opportunity to all qualified employees and applicants. This
commitment is reflected in all aspects of our daily operations. We do not
discriminate on the basis of race, color, sex, religion, national origin,
marital status, age, disability, veteran status, or genetic information in any
personnel practice, including recruitment, hiring, training, compensation,
promotion, and discipline. Additionally, we do not discriminate based on any
other characteristic protected by applicable state/provincial or local law
where a particular employee works. In addition, it is the policy of Attain
Finance to provide reasonable accommodation to qualified employees who have
protected disabilities to the extent required by federal law and any
state/provincial law where a particular employee works.

postTitle: Associate Field Service Technician
descContent:
**Description**  

Instala, depura y proporciona mantenimiento técnico para hardware y software
de productos y componentes, principalmente en las instalaciones del cliente.
Ofrece inspecciones programadas, limpieza y otros servicios, y realiza
reparaciones menores de productos dentro de un territorio asignado.
Inspecciona los productos para asegurar su correcto funcionamiento y resuelve
los problemas detectados o los escala según el procedimiento establecido.
Programa los servicios, completa toda la documentación necesaria y colabora
con los clientes para garantizar su satisfacción con la prestación del
servicio y la comprensión del funcionamiento del producto.

  
  
**Responsibilities**  

  * Se familiariza con las prácticas y procedimientos de los técnicos de servicio de campo.
  * Con la orientación o en colaboración con técnicos más experimentados, realiza cualquiera o todas las siguientes tareas: Manejo de incidentes: Utiliza herramientas de diagnóstico para la resolución de problemas mediante un análisis detallado de fallas de hardware y software.
  * Realiza reparaciones de hardware a nivel de componente.
  * Limpia y ajusta componentes mecánicos.
  * Configura e instala el software correspondiente.
  * Mantenimiento preventivo: Realiza comprobaciones rutinarias según los procedimientos documentados. Recarga de consumibles según las instrucciones. IMAC/R: Instala, traslada, añade, modifica y elimina productos de hardware y software.
  * Capacitación de clientes: Instruye y capacita a los clientes sobre el uso y la operación del hardware y software instalados.
  * Participa en capacitaciones regulares de hardware y software (en el trabajo, presenciales y en línea).
  * Participa en la implementación de medidas para alcanzar los KPI acordados. Colabora en proyectos especiales según se le asigne.

  
  
**Qualifications**  

**Required Qualifications**

  * Se requiere formación académica o experiencia laboral equivalente.
  * 0 a 2 años de experiencia relevante o una combinación equivalente de formación y experiencia en servicios de campo.
  * Buenas habilidades de comunicación escrita y verbal.

  
#LI-RM1

descContent:

项目框架与产品路线已明确，核心方向聚焦 真实资金流 + 用户信任构建，不是概念项目。

要求
有核心的思考深度和学习能力
成功主导过钱包/支付类产品的全链路产品规划
对用户钱包、支付需求有深入理解

postTitle: Remote Travel Advisor

postTitle: Google Ads Specialist
descContent:
We are looking for a Google Ads Specialist to manage, optimize, and scale
performance-driven campaigns across Google’s ecosystem. This role focuses
exclusively on Google Ads and is ideal for someone who is analytical, data-
driven, and results-oriented.

You will work closely with strategy, creative, and analytics teams to deliver
measurable growth for brands across multiple industries and global markets.

#### **Your Responsibilities**

Plan, launch, and optimize Google Ads campaigns (Search, Display, YouTube,
Performance Max)

Monitor performance daily and turn data into clear, actionable insights

Optimize budgets, bidding strategies, keywords, audiences, and creatives to
improve CPA, ROAS, CTR, and conversion rates

Conduct A/B testing on ad copy, creatives, landing pages, and campaign
structures

Manage and improve conversion tracking using Google Analytics & Google Tag
Manager

Analyze funnel performance and identify scaling opportunities

Prepare performance reports and communicate insights clearly to stakeholders

Stay up to date with Google Ads updates, policies, and best practices

What Sets You Apart

Background in Marketing, Advertising, Data, or a related field

Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience managing Google Ads campaigns

Strong understanding of:

Google Ads account structure & bidding strategies

Keyword research & search intent

Google Analytics (GA4) & Google Tag Manager

Conversion tracking & attribution

Highly analytical, detail-oriented, and performance-driven

Strong communication skills and ability to manage multiple campaigns at once

Experience running campaigns for international markets is a plus

#### **What We Offer**

Fully remote work with flexible working hours

Opportunity to manage performance-focused, global campaigns

Freedom to test, experiment, and scale winning strategies

Collaborative, fast-growing agency environment

Long-term growth opportunities based on performance

#### **How to Apply**

Please send your CV along with Google Ads case studies or campaign examples
(including goals and results) to: **hr@dsocialglobal.com**

postTitle: B2B Marketing Strategy Manager
descContent:
# Who We Are:

We are a tech-enabled growth firm–at the intersection of marketing, consulting
& data intelligence–igniting revenue and brand recognition for leading and
emerging companies around the world. As a people-first firm, we value
diversity in backgrounds and experiences. We strongly believe our people and
culture are key to our success. Our vision is to be recognized as the most
valued and respected private growth marketing firm in the world–with a
scalable brand, culture and services. Our mission is to power the relentless
pursuit of growth and redefine what’s possible through a team of growth-
obsessed experts who demand innovation and results - driven by integrity,
autonomy, and grit.

As a full-service growth marketing firm, we offer best-in-class services
including: SEO, Content Marketing, Paid Media, Social Media Marketing,
Programmatic + CTV, Public Relations, Influencer Marketing, Email + SMS,
Conversion Rate Optimization, Retail Marketing, and Creative. Here at Power
Digital, we are hyper-focused on helping brands drive revenue growth and brand
recognition, ultimately driving irrefutable value for our clients.

At the heart of Power Digital is our proprietary technology, nova, which
analyzes businesses through first-party data, simplifying investment planning
for marketing and diligence in M&A––putting marketers in a strategic seat at
the table––and providing value in unparalleled ways.

Managing billions in media, our dynamic team––of consultative marketers,
creatives, analysts and technologists––challenge traditional ways of planning
and measurement through meticulous testing and data science across each
milestone of the customer journey.

*****Proficiency in spoken and written English at an advanced level is
required for this role.**

**A day in the life:**

The **B2B Marketing Strategy Manager** is responsible for auditing current and
prospective clients’ marketing programs and crafting integrated marketing
plans across our full suite of channels, with special emphasis on social media
(Facebook, TikTok, etc) and Google Ads (SEM, GDN, and YouTube). You will work
closely with teams of channel specialists (including Programmatic, PR, SEO,
Affiliate, Influencer, and Email) to develop impactful marketing strategies
that will be used both by account teams and also to help Power Digital acquire
new clients.

**Responsibilities:**

  * **Planning** : determining the best budget allocation by channel, medium, environment, objective, and stage in the funnel
  * **Coordinating** : working with channel specialists to ensure channel-level strategies align with the overarching plan
  * **Research and analysis** : learning about the prospective client, their industry, vertical, similar clients and competitors, ideal customer profile, sentiment, etc
  * **Forecasting and projections** : working with our specialists to pressure test forecasts and ensure that projections match up with client budgets, efficiency requirements, and business objectives.

**Role Requirements:**

  * 5+ years of cross-channel marketing program management experience
  * Understanding of marketing funnels and flywheels
  * Previous experience with large sets of campaigns and/or clients ($100k+ spend per month per client)
  * Competence in Google Ads, Facebook, and/or similar self-serve platforms
  * Familiarity with the larger marketing and media buying landscape
  * Familiarity with earned media channels
  * Familiarity with audience insight tools such as Global Web Index
  * Familiarity with Asana and Slack

**Key Performance Indicators**

  * Appraisal Production (10+/mo)
  * Win Rate (50%+)
  * Percent of Appraised GP to Won GP (70%+)

**Most Important Things (MITs)**

  * Audit Quality
  * Audit Speed
  * Thought Leadership of appraisal collateral development
  * Accuracy of Appraisal Forecasts

 _Power Digital’s people and culture are at the core of our success, which is
why diversity in our team’s backgrounds and experiences are paramount. We are
an Equal Opportunity Employer and our employees are people with different
strengths, experiences, and backgrounds, who strive to make an impact inside
and outside of the workplace. Diversity not only includes race and gender
identity, but also age, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation,
religion and many other parts of one’s identity. All of our employees' points
of view are key to our success, and inclusion is everyone's responsibility._

_Please be aware of fictitious job openings, consulting engagements,
solicitations, or employment offers from suspicious sources. These engagements
may be an attempt to obtain private information, or to induce you to pay a fee
for services related to recruitment or training. Power Digital does NOT charge
any application, processing, or training fee at any stage of the recruitment
or hiring process. All genuine job openings will be posted on our careers page
at<https://powerdigitalmarketing.com/company/careers/>_
_[.](https://powerdigitalmarketing.com/company/careers/) If you have any
doubts about the authenticity of any messaging behalf of Power Digital, please
send us an email at
_[_recruiting@powerdigital.com_](mailto:recruiting@powerdigital.com) _before
taking any further action in relation to the correspondence._

* * *

postTitle: Campaign Manager
descContent:
At Kyra, we’re leading the future of creator marketing—where data, creativity,
technology and AI converge to empower creators and drive business impact for
the world’s most ambitious brands. Kyra is a full-service, AI-powered, global
influencer marketing agency, helping global enterprise brands like H&M,
L’Oreal and Amazon connect authentically with audiences through culturally
resonant content. With $15M in Series A funding, our flagship proprietary tech
platform, **Kyra Platform,** facilitates our team to deliver this at scale,
driving strategic impact with guaranteed performance.

As **Campaign Manager** , you’ll be the engine that powers Kyra’s creator
campaigns from start to finish. You’ll manage day-to-day campaign delivery,
ensuring that everything runs on time, on budget, and to the highest creative
standard. From briefing creators to reporting back to clients, you’ll bring
structure, energy, and problem-solving to every campaign you touch.

### What You’ll Be Doing

📋 **Campaign Management**

  * Own day-to-day management of influencer marketing campaigns across multiple brands

  * Oversee campaign timelines, budgets, deliverables, and approvals

  * Be the main point of contact for creators, clients, and internal teams

🎯 **Client Service**

  * Build trusted relationships with clients by delivering clear, proactive communication

  * Anticipate client needs and ensure campaigns exceed expectations

🤝 **Creator Collaboration**

  * Source, brief, and manage creators throughout campaign lifecycles

  * Ensure content meets brand guidelines, cultural nuance, and campaign objectives

📊 **Reporting & Optimisation**

  * Track campaign performance using Kyra’s proprietary platform and analytics tools

  * Provide actionable insights and recommendations for future campaigns

### What You Bring

📐 **Experience & Skills**

  * Fluent German Speaking 

  * 2–4 years’ experience in influencer marketing, talent management, or campaign/project management

  * Strong organisational skills with the ability to juggle multiple projects at speed

  * Confident communicator who can manage stakeholders with ease

🌍 **Industry Knowledge**

  * Understanding of social media platforms, creator culture, and digital marketing

  * Passion for the creator economy and emerging cultural trends

🔥 **Mindset & Drive**

  * Proactive problem-solver who thrives in a fast-paced environment

  * Collaborative, adaptable, and committed to high standards

**📩 Sound like you?**

We’d love to hear from campaign managers who are ready to step up and deliver
impactful creator marketing at scale.

💟 Support

If you have a condition or require an adjustment to our interview process -
please let us know so we can make adjustments to support you. Please note that
when you submit an application or resume, your data will be processed in line
with our .

postTitle: [招聘] 高级渗透测试工程师 / Red Team
jobTitle: 高级渗透测试工程师 / Red Team
descContent:
我们正在寻找能够独当一面的 Web
安全专家。纯结果导向，全远程办公。主要针对指定项目进行全面的渗透测试与漏洞复现。我们尊重技术价值，薪资采用高底薪加项目分红的激励机制。如果你厌倦了千篇一律的合规扫描，渴望在复杂环境中验证自己的技术上限，欢迎加入我们。

1 、专科及以上学历，计算机相关专业优先，具有独立进行 Web 渗透测试的实战经验（经验年限不限，看重能力）。 2 、熟悉网络安全基础，了解 HTTP
协议、常见操作系统（ Linux/Windows ）及数据库的基本操作与命令。 3 、熟悉 OWASP TOP10 漏洞原理，能准确识别并利用 SQL
注入、XSS 、文件上传、逻辑漏洞等常见 Web 风险。 4 、具备手工渗透测试能力，不完全依赖扫描器，能通过抓包分析验证漏洞存在，了解常见 WAF
的各种拦截机制。 5 、了解至少一门脚本语言（ Python/Java/PHP/Go 等），能看懂基础代码，或能编写简单的 POC/脚本辅助测试。 6
、熟练使用 Burpsuite 、Sqlmap 、CS 、Metasploit 、Fofa 等主流渗透与测绘工具，熟悉各种 Webshell
管理工具（蚁剑/冰蝎/哥斯拉）的使用。 7 、具备合格的文档编写能力，能清晰还原攻击过程并输出渗透测试报告，具备基本的数据整理意识。 8
、具备实战动手能力，面试环节包含靶场实操，需展示 Webshell 获取或漏洞利用过程（硬性指标）。 9
、项目技术挑战性强，按技术水平定级，上不封顶，采用“基本工资+高额项目提成”模式。 10
、全远程办公模式；面试前请务必确认工作性质，能接受该业务背景下的工作要求及工作地点定位。

以下情况可以加分&优先录取： 1.熟悉内网渗透拓展，熟练掌握操作系统提权、哈希传递（ PTH
）、中间人攻击、域渗透等常见攻击手段，能针对不同场景灵活运用攻击技巧。
2.具备二进制逆向分析经验、密码算法攻击经验，或有过涉网犯罪网站（菠菜、传销、色情）打击经验者优先录用。 3.熟悉海外主流云厂商（
AWS/Azure/GCP ）架构与安全特性，具备云原生、K8s 、Docker 容器逃逸及虚拟化攻击。 4.具备对抗海外主流 EDR/AV
的免杀/Bypass 能力，能够独立开发或修改 C2 工具（ Cobalt Strike/Sliver 等） profile
及加载器，精通流量伪装与隐匿技术者优先。 5.具备良好的外语（英语/日语等）读写能力（或熟悉目标环境的网页情况），擅长利用海外社交平台（
LinkedIn/Twitter/TG ）及各类社工库进行深度 OSINT （开源情报收集）与定向钓鱼攻击者优先。 6.熟悉软件供应链攻击手法，能利用
CI/CD 流水线、Jenkins 、Gitlab 、NPM/Docker Hub 等开发运维设施进行横向移动或敏感数据获取者优先。

可谈驻场可谈远程 欢迎联系 PM：6YKu566x77yacWF6eGN2MDA3QHByb3Rvbi5tZQpURzpAemgxMjU4OQ==
jobCategory: 安全,测试

postTitle: 社交小程序开发
descContent:
社交及活动搭子小程序，以下为主要功能需求：

postTitle: AI动态漫公司招募运营合伙人，共掘金新媒体内容蓝海
descContent:
【分成模式】AI动态漫公司招募运营合伙人，共掘金新媒体内容蓝海

我们是一家深耕AI动态漫制作的创业公司，手握成熟的AI生产管线与爆款内容基因，专注短剧向、垂类题材（如悬疑、甜宠、玄幻）动态漫的研发与变现。现开放运营合伙人席位，以利润分成模式诚邀同路人，共拓千亿新媒体内容市场！

我们能提供什么？

1. 成熟的内容生产能力：无需你操心制作环节，AI建模、分镜生成、动效合成全流程闭环，可快速批量产出符合平台爆款逻辑的动态漫内容。

2. 灵活的分成机制：摒弃固定薪资束缚，按项目利润阶梯分成，投入越多、成果越好，收益无上限；核心运营决策享有平等话语权。

3. 清晰的变现路径：覆盖短视频平台流量分成、付费点播、IP衍生、品牌定制等多元变现渠道，已有成功案例验证商业模式可行性。

4. 轻量化协作模式：无需坐班，远程办公即可，聚焦核心运营动作，高效推进项目落地。

我们希望你是这样的人

1. 懂平台，擅运营：熟谙抖音、快手、B站等短视频/中视频平台规则，精通动态漫/短剧类内容的流量操盘，包括选题对标、标题封面优化、投放策略制定、用户评论互动等。

2. 有资源，能落地：自带新媒体渠道资源、达人资源或品牌合作资源者优先；具备从0到1打造爆款账号的实操经验，能独立制定运营方案并落地复盘。

3. 认趋势，有野心：看好AI动态漫的赛道潜力，对内容变现有强烈欲望，愿意以合伙人身份共担风险、共享收益，不满足于“打工思维”。

4. 通协作，善复盘：具备良好的沟通能力与数据思维，能与制作团队高效配合，通过数据分析优化运营策略，持续提升内容转化率与账号影响力。

合伙人主要工作内容

1. 账号矩阵搭建：负责公司AI动态漫账号的定位、人设打造，制定长期运营规划。

2. 内容运营操盘：筛选优质题材脚本，优化视频剪辑节奏与包装风格，策划热点营销活动，提升内容曝光与完播率。

3. 变现渠道拓展：对接平台商洽流量分成政策，开拓付费点播、广告植入、IP授权等变现业务，最大化项目收益。

4. 数据复盘优化：定期分析账号数据（播放量、涨粉率、转化率等），调整运营策略，驱动内容与商业双增长。

合作模式与分成细则

1. 合作性质：非雇佣关系，为利润共享型合伙人，共同对项目收益负责。

2. 分成方式：扣除内容制作成本、投放成本等刚性支出后，按双方约定比例进行利润分成；阶梯式分成设计，收益越高，分成比例越高。

3. 结算周期：按月度/项目周期结算，账目公开透明，可随时核查。



我们期待与你并肩，用AI重构动态漫内容生态，一起把流量变成实实在在的收益！
salary: 利润阶梯分成，收益无上限
jobCategory: 运营,市场营销,内容创作,用户增长,项目管理

postTitle: Virtual Operations Manager
descContent:
# Virtual Operations Manager (Independent Contractor, Remote – International
Only)

  
Start Date: January - February 2026

Women Builders Council (WBC)  
Nonprofit | Professional Association | AEC Industry

The Women Builders Council (WBC), a New York–based nonprofit dedicated to
advancing women in the architecture, engineering, and construction industries,
is seeking a highly organized, detail-oriented, and proactive Virtual
Operations Manager. This full-time, independent contractor role (40
hours/week) is fully remote and open to international applicants only, with
required availability during standard New York business hours.

The Operations Manager will play a critical role in ensuring the smooth and
efficient functioning of the organization and will report directly to the
Executive Director.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES  
• Support daily operations across all WBC programs, committees, and events.  
• Maintain schedules, calendars, and deadlines; proactively flag upcoming
needs.  
• Draft, proofread, and send professional emails on behalf of the Executive
Director and organization.  
• Coordinate virtual meetings, board sessions, and committee updates.  
• Maintain and update organizational records, databases, membership lists, and
event trackers.  
• Prepare documents, spreadsheets, reports, and presentation materials.  
• Assist with logistics for large events, webinars, and member engagements.  
• Manage inbox organization and ensure timely responses.  
• Track expenses, invoices, and reimbursements; assist with basic financial
organization.  
• Support project workflows and help streamline systems for efficiency.  
• Uphold confidentiality and handle sensitive information professionally.

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS  
• Exceptional organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks
and deadlines simultaneously.  
• Strong professional written communication skills and email etiquette.  
• Fluent in English with excellent reading, writing, and proofreading
abilities.  
• High proficiency in Excel (sorting, filtering, formulas, basic reporting).  
• Comfortable using Google Workspace, Zoom, Canva, and CRM or membership
platforms (or willing to learn).  
• Self-directed, reliable, and able to manage time effectively in a fully
remote environment.  
• Nonprofit or professional association experience is a plus but not required.

WORK AUTHORIZATION & ENGAGEMENT TYPE  
This role is offered as an independent contractor position and is open to
international applicants only. Applicants must be legally authorized to work
in their country of residence and able to perform services for a U.S.-based
organization without visa sponsorship, relocation assistance, or immigration
support. The Women Builders Council does not provide U.S. work authorization,
visa sponsorship, or employment-based immigration assistance for this role.

SCHEDULE & AVAILABILITY  
This role requires consistent availability Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. –
4:00 p.m. Eastern Time (New York time). Applicants must be able to reliably
work during these hours.

HOLIDAYS  
The contractor will observe U.S. federal holidays as recognized by the Women
Builders Council.

COMPENSATION & BENEFITS  
Compensation will be provided as a fixed monthly fee in U.S. dollars, between
$1,200 - $1,500, commensurate with experience and skill level. As an
independent contractor role, this position does not include health insurance,
retirement benefits, paid leave, or other employee benefits. Contractors are
responsible for all taxes, withholdings, and statutory obligations required in
their country of residence.

INTERVIEW PROCESS  
Final candidates will be asked to complete a written and technical assessment
as part of the interview process.

  
  

Please mention the word **AUTHENTIC** when applying to show you read the job
post completely (#RMTI0LjEzLjE5NC4xNDA=). This is a feature to avoid fake spam
applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this
and instantly see they're human.  
  

## Salary and compensation

  
$10,000 — $20,000/year
jobCategory: 运营,项目管理,财务

postTitle:
招聘（Web3/CEX-远程办公）： 
钱包底层/钱包架构师
钱包安全风控工程师
Web3 钱包与 DeFi/Swap 集成工程师
区块链开发工程师（接链及节点维护方向）
资深风控算法工程师
jobTitle: 钱包底层/钱包架构师, 钱包安全风控工程师, Web3 钱包与 DeFi/Swap 集成工程师, 区块链开发工程师（接链及节点维护方向）, 资深风控算法工程师
descContent:
Position 一：钱包底层/钱包架构师  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Remote  
PS：  
1.经验要求：  
1 ） 5 年以上后端开发经验， 其中至少 3 年以上专注于交易所核心钱包系统或高安全要求的金融系统的架构设计和开发。  
2 ） 具备团队管理 、技术领导（ TL ） 或架构师经验， 有带领 5 人以上技术团队的成功案例。  
2.技术栈：  
1 ）精通至少一种主流后端语言（ Golang/Rust 优先） ，对高性能、高并发系统有深刻理解。  
2 ）具备丰富的分布式系统设计经验，熟悉微服务架构、消息队列（ Kafka/RabbitMQ ）和高可用数据库（
MySQL/PostgreSQL/NoSQL ） 的选型与优化。  
3.钱包安全核心能力：  
1 ）精通比特币 、 以太坊等主流区块链的底层原理 、交易机制和安全特性。  
2 ）对钱包私钥安全 、HD 钱包 、多重签名 、冷热存储策略 、HSM/KMS/签名机集成有实战经验和架构能力。  
3 ） 具备设计资金清算 、对账和风控系统的严谨性和专业性。  
  
  
Position 二：钱包安全风控工程师  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Remote  
PS：  
1.经验要求：3 年以上后端开发经验， 其中至少 2 年专注于交易所钱包安全、 区块链安全或金融风控相关领域。  
2.技术栈： 精通至少一种主流编程语言（如 Golang/Python/Java/Rust ） ，具备扎实的计算机科学基础。  
3.区块链专业知识： 深入理解 BTC UTXO 模型 、ETH Account 模型及 ERC-20/ERC-721 等代币标准
。熟悉主流公链的交易结构和安全特性。  
4.安全经验： 具备私钥管理 、加密算法 、安全协议（如 TLS/SSL ） 的实战经验，了解 HSM/KMS 的工作原理和使用。  
5.风控经验： 具备设计和实现高并发 、低延迟的实时风控或反欺诈系统的经验。  
  
  
Position 三：Web3 钱包与 DeFi/Swap 集成工程师  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Remote  
PS：  
1.经验要求：3 年以上软件开发经验，其中至少 2 年以上专注于区块链领域，具备 Web3 钱包或 DeFi 协议（ DEX/借贷） 的实际开发和集成经验。  
2.区块链专业知识：  
1 ）深入理解 EVM （以太坊虚拟机）的工作原理，熟悉 Trie 树、交易内存池、Gas 机制等底层概念。  
2 ） 能熟练使用 web3.js / ethers.js 等库进行智能合约交互， 理解 ABI 编码。3.开发技能：  
1 ）精通至少一种后端语言（如 Golang/Node.js/Python/Rust ），并熟悉主流前端框架（如 React/Vue ）
以支持钱包前端的实现。  
2 ） 熟悉多链生态（如 Solana, Polkadot, Cosmos 等） 的钱包和交易特点。  
4.安全意识： 对私钥存储、助记词生成、HD 钱包（ BIP-32/39/44 ）有深刻理解，具备客户端侧安全防护意识。  
  
  
Position 四：区块链开发工程师 （接链及节点维护方向）  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Remote  
PS：  
1.必备经验  
1 ） 5 年 Linux 系统开发/运维经验，3 年区块链节点运维实战。  
2 ） 主导过 10+条公链节点集群建设（含 ETH/BTC 等资源密集型链）  
3 ）精通 Golang 开发， 有高并发 RPC 服务优化经验（ 10 万+ QPS ）  
4 ） 熟练 MySQL 集群管理（ Percona XtraDB Cluster/Vitess ）  
5 ）精通 Docker/Kubernetes 生产级运维（ CKA 认证优先）  
2.核心技能  
1 ） 节点调优：  
ETH 节点 Geth/Erigon 深度调优（内存数据库/快照机制）  
BTC 节点 UTXO 缓存优化（减少 IBD 时间 50%+）  
2 ） P2P 网络：  
掌握 DevP2P/Libp2p 协议栈， 能诊断网络分区问题有抗 DDOS 攻击实战经验（ SYN Flood/连接耗尽）  
3 ） 数据解析：  
精通交易解码（ ABI/Protobuf/BCS 反序列化）  
熟悉区块结构差异（ BTC UTXO vs ETH 账户模型）  
3.软技能  
1 ） 能处理交易所级紧急故障（如主网硬分叉异常）  
2 ） 编写军工级运维文档（ SOP/故障手册/RCA 报告）  
3 ） 具备成本优化意识（节点云资源消耗降低 30%+）  
4 ） 教育背景  
计算机/网络工程/分布式系统本科及以上学历。  
  
  
Position 五：资深风控算法工程师  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Remote  
PS：  
1.教育背景： 计算机科学 、金融工程 、统计学 、数学 、保险学或相关专业。  
2.专业技能：  
\- 深入理解常用的风控算法及其使用场景， 包括社区发现 、用户行为序列等。  
\- 熟练掌握机器学习（逻辑回归、决策树、随机森林、XGBoost ）和深度学习（ CNN 、LSTM 、Transformer ）
的基本原理及其在风控中的应用。  
\- 掌握常用的深度学习框架（ TensorFlow 、PyTorch 等）。  
\- 编程能力：熟悉 Java/Python 等语言， 能熟练使用上述语言之一进行项目开发，具备良好的代码编写和调试能力。  
\- 数据分析能力：具备较强的数据分析和处理能力，能够快速理解和处理复杂的数据。  
3.实践经验： 有风控项目开发经验， 能够独立完成模型及策略的设计 、实现和优化 。具有交易/电商行业背景 、黑灰产治理经验， 或实际项目部署经验者优先。  
4.团队合作与沟通： 良好的团队合作精神和沟通能力， 能够与不同团队成员高效协作。  
5.创新精神：对新技术充满热情，具有较强的学习能力和创新意识， 能够主动探索和应用最新的研究成果。  
  
  
请携带简历咨询，谢谢；  
TG：@jtx_2023  
E: [justinxu@futuretalent.com.cn](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)
jobCategory: 后端开发,区块链,算法,运维,安全

postTitle: Senior Backend Engineer API | Matcha at 0x
jobTitle: Senior Backend Engineer API | Matcha at 0x
descContent:
**COMPANY**

At [0x](https://0x.org/), our mission is to "Create a Tokenized World Where
All Forms of Value Can Flow Freely". We deliver this to web3 builders with a
delightfully simple suite of developer APIs that provide faster trading,
better prices, and superior user experience.

Founded in 2017, we’ve processed over 78M+ transactions and $140B+ in trading
volume from users trading on Matcha, Coinbase Wallet, Robinhood Wallet,
Phantom, Rainbow, DefiLlama, MetaMask, Zerion, Zapper, and many more. Our
investors include Greylock Partners, Pantera Capital, and Jump Crypto.

When you join 0x, you’ll become part of a veteran team of crypto builders who
know the importance of code quality, team cohesion, and a culture of learning.

[Matcha](http://matcha.xyz/) is a DEX aggregator, built by 0x. With over 5
million tokens indexed across 9 blockchains, the decentralized exchange
provides aggregated liquidity from +100 sources and the most efficient trade
execution through smart routing. Matcha offers swaps, limit orders and cross
chain trades, having enabled over $62B volume and 3.5M+ trades as the first
consumer-facing product by the 0x team.

[0x](http://0x.org/) platform is developers' one-stop shop to build financial
products on crypto rails. 0x empowers hundreds of teams and developers with
essential web3 tools to enable faster trading, better prices and superior UX.
Our suite of APIs has processed over 60M+ million transactions and $133B+ in
volume from more than 6 million users trading on apps like Coinbase Wallet,
Robinhood Wallet, Metamask, Zerion, Zapper, and more.

### **Matcha API Tech Stack**

We care far more that someone has solid fundamentals, strong learning agility,
and is an overall good human. That said, we’re excited about the rapidly
evolving tech we’re building on. It includes:

  * TypeScript + Node/Express (core stack)

  * Rust

  * AWS Cloud Services (Kubernetes, Kafka, Postgres, Redis, OpenSearch, etc)

  * Grafana LGTM Observability Stack

  * Next.js

### **Responsibilities - Your Mission**

  * Be an individual contributor on projects as well as lead technical projects of moderate to high complexity

  * Offer valuable insights as a peer when reviewing designs and performing code reviews

  * Create high quality, secure, clean code

  * Improve the way we build and deliver software

  * Consistently ship

  * Coach and mentor other engineers and generally up-level the team

  * Empathize with our customers and users

### **Requirements - Who you are**

  * 7+ years of experience solving complex distributed computing problems.

  * Fluent in TypeScript/JavaScript - you can confidently write and debug APIs in Node/Express without relying on type-casting hacks or constant lookup.

  * Experienced with designing and building systems that include:

    * Relational or Key-Value datastores

    * Distributed, event-driven architectures (Kafka, queues, streams)

    * Cloud-based deployment (preferably AWS)

    * External-facing REST/HTTP APIs

    * Monitoring dashboards (preferably Grafana)

  * Strong problem-solving and debugging skills - you can isolate issues, reason through errors, and explain your approach clearly.

  * Up to date on emerging trends in modern backend technology solutions (databases, queues, caching, etc.).

  * Passionate about DeFi and how it can improve people’s lives. You’ve used DeFi apps yourself and care about building better ones.

  * Two annual in-person team meet-ups around the globe

### **Preferred**

  * Experience working with search engines (ElasticSearch, OpenSearch).

  * Solid understanding of blockchains (especially EVM chains). You know fundamentals like chain IDs (e.g., Ethereum mainnet = 1, Polygon = 137) and how replay protection works.

  * Experience working with JSON-RPC APIs to interact with blockchain nodes for tasks like querying data, sending transactions, or monitoring events.

  * Experience with Web3 libraries (e.g., ethers.js, viem, Web3.js) to build/test blockchain integrations.

### **Benefits**

  * The base salary range for this position is $95,000 - $230,000 + equity + ZRX tokens + benefits. Within the range, individual pay is determined by job-related skills, experience, location, business needs, and candidate preferences between the different compensation elements.

  * Comprehensive insurance (medical/dental/vision/life/disability) for U.S.-based employees — 100% of base plan covered for you and dependents

  * 401k and FSA for U.S.-based employees

  * Monthly mobile phone bill, wellness, and pre-tax transportation expense

  * Covered mental health benefits (included professional therapy sessions)

  * A supportive remote environment

  * Lunch reimbursement for all employees across the globe!

  * Stipend for your ideal remote / WFH set-up: headphones, and any other work gear you may need

  * 12-week paid parental leave

  * Great office conveniently located in the SF Financial District for those in the region!

  * Flexible vacation: Take time when you need it (and we really mean it!)

0x and its associated entities are dedicated to fostering diversity,
inclusion, and belonging in its teams and workforce, and are proud to be equal
opportunity employers. 0x does not make employment or hiring decisions on the
basis of race, color, creed, religion, sex (including those who are pregnant
or have given birth), sexual orientation, gender, gender expression or
identity, age, disability, medical condition, genetic information, military or
veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, citizenship, national origin,
immigration or citizenship status, political affiliation, or any other basis
that is protected by applicable local, state, or federal laws. This includes
not making such decisions based on the status itself, as well as any
associations, perceptions, and assumptions made regarding these statuses. 0x
will also consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records in
a way that is consistent with San Francisco’s Fair Chance Ordinance and
similar local laws. Our commitment to equal employment opportunity extends to
ensuring that all applicants and employees can perform to their fullest
potential, including through obtaining reasonable accommodations when
necessary.

postTitle: [大湾区远程] 鹅同学名片：寻找有工程品味的队友 (GitLab CI/CD + Linear + AI 原生工作流)
jobTitle: 前端开发工程师、后端开发工程师
descContent:
**关于团队**

我们是一个自研 AI 名片的团队，产研驱动。团队主要来自微信、字节，基本都是毕业于各世界名校；目前已经完成了两轮融资。已入驻的知名高校/企业/协会有 MIT
、腾讯、Cursor 、中国产业海外发展协会等。  
  
目前市面上的 Agent
产品都是处理信息，接下来一定是处理人与人之间的信任和交易，我们的愿景是通过为智能体经济时代提供交易和信任的基建，来加速商业世界的信任传递。

**关于薪酬：**

  * **前端实习** ：200 - 300 / 天
  * **前后端（ 3 年左右）** ：10k - 15k (纯远程 + AI 工具全包 + 极低内耗)

* * *

### 🔍 我们在寻找什么样的“鹅队友”？

我们不在乎你背了多少八股文，我们更在乎你的 **GitHub 提交记录、技术博客里的深度思考，以及你对 C 端产品那种近乎偏执的体验追求。**

#### 1\. 前端开发工程师 (实习 / ~3 年)

  * **硬核栈** ：React / Vue 3 / Taro 。我们希望你对框架不只是“会用”，而是理解其背后的响应式原理或 Fiber 架构。
  * **C 端基因** ：参与过完整的自研 C 端产品，对 UI/UX 有审美，受不了 1px 的对齐偏差，对 H5/小程序的性能优化有实战经验。
  * **跨端能力** ：熟悉 Taro 等跨端方案，能处理好不同平台的差异性。

#### 2\. 后端开发工程师 (~3 年)

  * **硬核栈** ：Golang / Java 为主。我们不看重你会多少种语言，看重你处理一致性、幂等性和分布式事务的内功。
  * **工程素养** ：深度理解 **GitLab CI/CD** ，认为“手动部署”是文明社会的退步。能写出覆盖率高且有意义的单测。
  * **中间件** ：对 MySQL 优化、Redis 缓存策略、Kafka 消息堆积处理有实操经验，而不是仅仅听过名词。

* * *

### 🌟 我们眼中的“加分 DNA”（非常重要）

我们是一个由技术人驱动的团队，如果你具备以下特质，请务必在简历中突出：

  * **开源社区活跃分子** ：在 GitHub 上有持续维护的项目，或者给知名项目贡献过 PR （请附上 ID ）。
  * **技术布道者** ：拥有长期更新的技术博客或专栏，能把复杂的技术点讲清楚，这是**低熵沟通** 的基础。
  * **新技术的发烧友** ：对 LLM 、向量数据库有浓厚兴趣，是 Cursor / Windsurf 等 AI Coding 工具的重度用户。
  * **自驱动创造者** ：有过独立开发产品（甚至只是个小工具）并上线运营的经历。

* * *

### 📍 协作契约：大湾区限定的“赛博生活”

  * **纯远程办公** ：基于 **Linear** 的异步协作。我们不考核工时，只考核“任务动量”。
  * **大湾区限定 && 大小周**：因为我们每两周会有一次线下。通常在周六我们会选在深圳聚首。
  * **面基不 Coding** ：线下这一天只负责**吃喝、团建、分享技术、复盘目标** 。我们要的是真实的连接，而不是换个地方敲键盘。
  * **面试流程** ：**没有八股文** 。我们会针对你的 GitHub 项目或博客内容展开讨论，聊聊你是如何解决实际工程问题的。

* * *

### 📮 投递说明

  * **简历投递** ：`[naivetoby@gmail.com](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)`
  * **邮件标题** ：`V2EX - 职位 - 姓名 - 现居城市`
  * **必带附件** ：简历 + **GitHub 链接 / 个人博客地址 / 参与过的 C 端产品链接或截图** 。

**我们坚信：优秀的开发者是自带光芒的。期待在下一次面基的饭桌上见到你！**

postTitle: Croatian CRM Content Localization Specialist
descContent:
Medier isn’t just a marketing agency—we’re creative partners to our clients.
From digital and social media strategies to PR, influencer collaborations,
SEO, programmatic advertising, and CRM, we offer a comprehensive suite of
expert services. By combining creativity with data-driven insights, we don’t
just deliver campaigns—we deliver results.  
Our philosophy is simple — hire a team of diverse, passionate people and
foster a culture that empowers you to do your best work. Is it a match? You’re
in.

As our CRM Localization Specialist for Croatian, you’ll be the creative force
behind our content in the language, crafting and translating compelling copy
that resonates with our audience. Your work will play a pivotal role in
shaping engaging narratives and communicating incentives efficiently.

**Responsibilities:**

  * Craft and manage high-quality Croatian CRM content.
  * Translate and localize English content into the Croatian language, ensuring cultural relevance and accuracy.
  * Collaborate with a dynamic team to produce and localize content that engages and informs our customers.
  * Maintain the integrity and quality of our content despite tight deadlines, reflecting our brands’ standards and voice.
  * Continuously update content to reflect the latest trends and updates the iGaming industries.

**Requirements:**

  * Native in Croatian and fluent/native in English, with exceptional writing skills in both languages. Additional languages of advantage.
  * Curiosity for understanding how cultural and linguistic nuances influence audience engagement and motivation.
  * A passion for iGaming and the ability to generate engaging content.
  * A sharp eye for detail and the capacity to produce error-free content.
  * Experience with Google suite, JIRA, Slack, and PowerBI.
  * Self-driven and strong organizational and time-management abilities.
  * A collaborative spirit, eager to work within a team to meet business goals.
  * Office-based will be highly advantageous, but remote will be considered.

Reshape marketing with us. Let’s work!

**By submitting your application, you agree to our[Privacy
Policy.](https://www.medieragency.com/privacy-policy)**
