postTitle: Client Support Specialist (Healthcare Facilities - B2B)
descContent:
## **About the Role**

Clipboard Health is looking for highly motivated, customer-focused individuals
to join our team as B2B Support Specialists (Workplace Support Agents). This
is not a traditional call center role—you will be the frontline specialist for
our most valuable business clients, our workplace customers. Your job is to
proactively solve client issues, prevent churn, and ensure a seamless
experience for our customers.

This is primarily a voice-based role, with additional responsibilities that
include handling emails as needed

## **Responsibilities**

  * Deliver fast, accurate, and empathetic support to our workplace customers across voice and email, resolving shift, payment, and platform-related issues in real time

  * Navigate tools like Zendesk and the Clipboard Health portal to investigate cases, update form fields, log clear internal notes, and maintain accurate documentation

  * Apply sound judgment and critical thinking to troubleshoot issues, follow or adapt workflows, and escalate only when necessary

  * Develop deep expertise in our products and processes to identify recurring issues or process gaps, helping improve both customer experiences and internal operations.

  * Work cross-functionally with teams such as Billing, Account Management, and Worker Operations to gather the necessary information and ensure customer issues are resolved effectively

  * Uphold our [values](https://www.clipboardhealth.com/careers) such as unreasonably fast, ownership, and uncomfortably high standards in every interaction 

## **Success Factors**

  * **Customer-Centric Mindset** – You genuinely care about helping customers and take ownership of their problems.

  * **Strong Communication Skills** – Clear, professional English (both spoken and written) is critical for success in this role.

  * **Proactive Problem-Solving** – You don’t just follow scripts—you think critically and find long-term solutions for customers.

  * **High Accountability** – We value people who hold themselves to high standards and consistently deliver results.

## **Qualifications**

  * Open to candidates of all experience levels—what matters most is your ability to handle business customers professionally and solve problems effectively.

  * No specific degree required—we care about what you can do, not just what’s on your résumé.

## **Why Join Clipboard Health?**

  * 100% Remote – Always. Work from anywhere in the world.

  * Fast-Paced Startup Environment. Join a company that values curiosity, independence, and growth.

  * A Hiring Process That Rewards Skills, Not Just Experience. Every applicant gets a fair shot—our selection is based on real-world problem-solving ability, not just credentials.

  * Opportunity to make a significant impact with our workplace customers

## **System Requirements**

To succeed in this role, you must have:

  * A reliable laptop/desktop (no Chromebooks or Linux OS).

  * Minimum 20 Mbps wired internet connection.

  * Wired headset for clear communication.

  * A quiet, distraction-free workspace.

  * Stable power and internet connectivity.

## **Working Hours**

Clipboard Health operates 24/7 to meet our business needs, and general agent
schedules are as follows:

  * 5 days per week

  * 9-hour days

  * 1.5 hours of daily break time

We offer a variety of shifts with different start times and working day
combinations. Flexibility increases your chances of matching our current
openings, which can shift regularly. You'll be asked to confirm the hours
you're available to work. Days off will be assigned based on business needs
and do not change week to week. All shift times are listed in Pacific Time
(US/Los Angeles), so you’ll need to convert them to your local time zone.

  1. If your availability aligns with current needs, you will be in consideration to move forward with the hiring process.

  2. If your availability does not align with current needs, we will contact you if and when your preferred schedules become available.

  3. Weekend availability is required. If you're not available on weekends this may not be the right time to apply. 

## **Hiring Process**

  1. Application

  2. Case Study

  3. Interview with Hiring Manager

  4. Executive Interview

  5. Offer

**Ready to Make an Impact? Apply Now!**

If you're passionate about helping customers, solving complex issues, and
working in a high-growth startup, we’d love to hear from you!

📌**Next Steps After Application:**

  * The application form also includes basic customer support skill-based questions. Getting any of these questions wrong will result in automatic rejection—these assess your ability to handle real client situations.

  * You will receive an email with the next steps in the process within 2 days of your application.

  * Check your spam folder! If you don’t see the email, make sure it hasn’t been filtered out or blocked.

* * *
jobCategory: 客户服务,技术支持

postTitle: Stock & Options Trader – Trade Firm Capital
jobTitle: Stock & Options Trader – Trade Firm Capital
descContent:
**Trade with one of the few prop firms in the world that actively trade
options.**

Maverick Trading is not your typical prop firm. We don’t run “challenges” or
profit from failed traders—we profit _only when you profit._ That means our
incentives are fully aligned with your success.

For over 25 years, we’ve funded experienced stock and options traders while
also training motivated beginners to become consistently profitable. Options
are a powerful market: they provide strategic flexibility, risk management
tools, and opportunities to profit in rising, falling, or even sideways
markets. Whether you’re ready for firm capital today or looking to learn and
grow into it, Maverick provides the mentorship, structure, and funding to help
you succeed.

* * *

### Why Join Us

  * **Profit splits up to 90%** — keep the lion’s share of what you earn.

  * **Capital growth with performance** — accounts scale as your consistency grows.

  * **We train new traders & fund them** — no “challenges,” just structured support.

  * **We fund experienced traders immediately** — step in and scale with firm capital.

  * **Start part-time, move full-time if you choose** — trading is best learned while working another job.

  * **Remote-first, globally connected** — trade from anywhere.

  * **Built to last** — one of the oldest prop firms in the U.S.

  * **Options trading edge** — one of the few prop firms in the world that actively trade options.

* * *

### The Role

  * Trade **stocks and options** with firm capital.

  * Manage risk responsibly and execute within a professional trading framework.

  * Work asynchronously with a global network of traders — no micromanagement, just results.

  * Leverage ongoing mentoring, education, and community support to refine your edge.

* * *

### Who You Are

  * An **experienced stock/options trader** seeking firm capital and scaling potential, **or**

  * A **motivated beginner** ready to train, develop, and earn funding.

  * Independent, disciplined, and comfortable working remotely.

  * Excited by financial markets and motivated to grow long term.

  * Collaborative — while you’ll trade solo, you value learning from a community of peers.

* * *

### Our Culture

We’re a fully remote team spread across time zones. Traders here thrive on
**autonomy, flexibility, and async collaboration.** No commutes, no endless
Zoom calls — just the freedom to trade your edge while being supported by a
seasoned community.

At Maverick, you can start part-time while keeping your current job, then
transition into full-time trading if that’s your goal. We’re about building
careers, not selling challenges.

* * *

**About Maverick Trading**

Maverick Trading is one of the oldest proprietary trading firms in the U.S.,
with over 25 years of experience funding traders worldwide. We’re a **remote-
first, profit-sharing firm** — we only succeed when our traders do. Whether
you’re an experienced stock/options trader ready for capital or a motivated
beginner seeking structured training, we provide the support, mentorship, and
funding to help you grow.

* * *

Apply now and take the next step toward trading with firm capital.  
  

* * *
jobCategory: 金融

postTitle: [成都] 找个 Python 后端聊聊 AI 落地，不急入职，年前年后都行
descContent:
项目情况： 我是技术负责人，目前在搞一个海外垂直领域的语义搜索。 实话实说： 小团队，刚起步，目前没代码（ 0-1
阶段），没盈利。我也给不了大厂那种五险一金、下午茶和团建。如果你年底想求稳拿福利，这儿真不适合。  
  
为什么我觉得这事儿值得聊： 这个项目是从我们之前几个版本演化来的。上上个项目我们 3 个人搞了一个月 Demo
，内测还没开就被收购了。上个项目有手握几百万用户的大咖找我合作，让我全权负责新项目运营，要技术给技术
要流量给流量，但是技术跟老板有点亲戚关系，诶，一言难尽，虽然大树下面好乘凉，但是自己成为大树更有吸引力，我们在这个垂直行业待了很久，流量、资源、头部 IP
都是现成的。所谓的“蓝海”不是吹牛，几句话就能讲明白市场在哪，纯粹是缺个硬核技术把 AI + LLM 彻底落地。  
  
我要找的人： 主要是 Python 后端，偏 AI/RAG/搜索 这一块。  
技术点： 异步那套（ FastAPI/Asyncio ）要熟。向量库（ Milvus/Qdrant ）得能实操。  
核心目标： 把非标数据洗干净，用 RAG 提炼价值，把搜索精度做上去。  
加分项： 英语能力强，做过知识库，检索方向的优先，本地部署开源模型，能微调，有过一年以上经验极优  
关于待遇（现金说话）： 既然没社保福利，那我现金一定给够。按招聘要求：18k - 30k ，如果你觉得这个价低了，只要技术够硬，咱们单独谈。  
  
工作模式： 外包、兼职、全职、技术合伙都行。  
自由度： 我也不喜欢加班和演戏。只要活儿干得漂亮，你想在咖啡馆办公还是几点起床，我都不管。  
  
碎碎念：
快过年了，估计大家都在等年终奖，我也不急着招人马上干活。发这个贴是想先物色个懂行、能打的搭档。如果你现在还没离职，我们可以年前先加个微信认识下，喝杯咖啡，觉得事儿靠谱，年后过来一起搞也行。  
这种机会一般内推就消化了，但我确实想找个纯粹点的技术人，我也很讨厌大厂那种制度，几点下班，几点上班，每月汇报，考核，工作站队，职场文化等等，罗里吧嗦了一大堆，如果有遗漏或者想深入了解的
可直接留言或 PM 我  
  
WeChat （欢迎闲聊） : QTg4OFNS  
Email(求职投递) : cmhvbmRhbXN0ckBnbWFpbC5jb20=  
(备注 V2EX ，简单介绍下你做过的项目)
jobType: 全职、兼职、外包、技术合伙均可
jobCategory: 后端开发,AI,算法,数据开发,DevOps/MLOps

postTitle: 项目制：智能电子产品硬件开发+App （杭州）
jobTitle: 智能电子产品硬件开发+App
descContent:
**我们正在构建什么？**

我们是建筑设计和科技结合背景的一个智能家居电子产品初创团队，坐标杭州。我们致力于打造下一代智能家居解决方案（智能硬件+AI应用）。初期，我们将从一款创新的智能硬件（类似蓝牙基站+多墨水屏电子价签）原型起步，快速迭代验证。

因为技术的限制，我们的0号原型 MVP 是在一个类似竞品上做的简单改造（做实验），这一步我们已经完成。随着0号原型的实验和市场测试，我们的需求是 1号原型的开发（自主技术的硬件软件系统），并会有在这个基础上做App 特别定制要求（本质功能是有别于竞品的）。

核心系统需求与性能指标（脱敏描述）

• 分布式架构： 必须采用 “一主控 + 若干个独立从控” 的架构。主控负责整体调度与外部通信，每个价签位配备一个独立的从控单元，负责该位价签的独立通信与显示驱动。

• 核心性能目标： 实现 多个价签的准并行刷新，从触发更新指令到全部价签完成显示刷新的总时间须控制在 5 秒以内，以提升终端用户体验。

• 价签通信（纯无源机制）： 每个从控单元需通过 强 NFC/RFID 技术 与价签通信，主要功能为 通过射频场实现无线供电、唤醒及数据写入。标签端无内置电池。

• 显示刷新： 主控将待显示数据包同步下发至各从控后，各从控应能独立、异步地驱动其连接的电子墨水屏完成刷新流程，无需等待其他位。

App 开发 （iOS 系统）
基本功能：
1 价签的模版（用户可以自行设计：文字和图案，编辑和排版）
2 价签的数据库（需要有批量上传数据功能如Excel表格导入，还需要有根据设定好的程序可以自动生成批量数据等）
3 需要提供给用户进行管理价签数据库的UI。
4 简单的生成式 AI 功能模块。

**您的核心职责：**

1. **主导硬件原型开发：** 负责智能基站与墨水屏电子价签的嵌入式软件系统设计、开发、调试与优化，确保稳定、低功耗、高性能的无线通信与控制。

2. **实现核心通信机制：** 设计并实现基站与多个电子价签之间高效、可靠的通信协议，攻克一键群发、状态同步、功耗管理等技术难点。

3. **软硬件协同设计：** 深度参与硬件选型（主控MCU、蓝牙模块、电源管理等），撰写驱动与中间件，将硬件能力充分转化为产品功能，并与云端API对接。

4. **支撑产品迭代：** 基于产品需求，快速实现功能逻辑、交互流程的调整，并通过固件升级（OTA）等方式持续优化用户体验。

5. **为未来铺路：** 编写清晰、模块化、可扩展的代码，为中期集成本地AI推理模块（如价格动态计算）及远期接入应用市场做好技术准备。

**我们期待您具备：**

**硬性要求：**

1. **经验：** 3年以上嵌入式/物联网产品开发经验，**独立或作为核心成员完成过至少1个量产级硬件产品的软件开发与交付**。

2. **技术栈：**

   * **精通C/C++**，具备扎实的嵌入式系统知识，精通至少一种主流ARM Cortex-M系列MCU。

   * **精通低功耗蓝牙（BLE）协议栈**，有复杂的多设备连接、数据广播项目经验。

   * 熟悉硬件开发流程，能看懂原理图，熟练使用示波器、逻辑分析仪等工具进行调试。

   * 熟悉嵌入式实时操作系统（如FreeRTOS、Zephyr等）及其开发模式。

3. **产品思维：** 理解C端产品逻辑，能从用户体验和稳定性角度思考代码设计，具备强烈的质量意识和问题解决能力。

⠀
**优先考虑（加分项）：**

1. **有墨水屏（电子纸）驱动与优化经验**，深刻理解其刷新特性、功耗与显示效果平衡。

2. **有物联网设备OTA升级、低功耗设计、设备组网**的实际项目经验。

3. 熟悉Wi-Fi、LoRa等其他无线通信技术，或有基本的电路设计/PCB绘制能力。

4. 熟悉Python等脚本语言，用于编写测试工具和自动化脚本。

5. 有消费电子、智能家居、智能零售相关领域开发经验。

6. **审美与交互感**：在资源受限的嵌入式环境中，仍能关注并优化墨水屏的UI布局、交互动效，追求简洁美观的用户界面。
⠀
**核心能力：**

* **极强的动手与问题解决能力**：能从现象快速定位硬件或软件问题根源，并提出解决方案。

* **系统思维**：理解自己开发的模块在整体系统（硬件-固件-云端-前端）中的位置与影响。

* **高效沟通与协作**：能清晰编写技术文档，主动同步进展与风险，适应以结果为导向的工作模式。

**交付物与里程碑**

1. 阶段一：技术方案与评审（启动后 2 周）
o 重点交付： 系统架构图、关键元器件选型方案、NFC 天线布局与强场抗干扰评估报告、BOM 成本分析。

2. 阶段二：EVT 工程样机（方案确认后4-6 周）
o 要求： 功能完整，外观可为测试结构，但机械精度需达标。

3. 阶段三：定制 App（方案确认后 5-8 周）
o 要求： 基本核心功能模块必须保证无误，生成式 AI 模块可以简单使用并生成可用结果。

项目周期 8-12weeks， 项目预算 20K-50K， 要求最好为杭州本地，方便沟通。
jobCategory: 客户端开发,全栈开发,AI,项目管理

postTitle: 独立项目开发已验证商业闭环 寻找cto/伙伴
descContent:
【岗位福利】  
上班时间灵活自由，支持全球远程办公，无需坐班。  
核心团队激励，通过项目爆发实现长期的财务自由。  
提供出国外派及海外市场拓展机会。

【岗位要求】

1.  5年以上硬核全栈开发经验，精通微信小程序原生开发及 App (Flutter/React Native) 开发；后端深耕 Node.js / Go / Python（至少精通其一）。
2.  具备深厚的代码阅读与审美能力。必须是 Cursor / AI Coding 的重度使用者，能够利用 AI 工具实现开发效率的倍增，并能建立 AI 辅助开发的标准流程。
3.  对 LBS（地理位置服务）、高并发实时交互及复杂任务系统有深厚的理解和架构设计经验。
4.  具备优秀的团队管理潜力，能够从 0 到 1 筛选并凝聚一支精干的技术梯队，而非简单的“管人”。

【岗位职责】

1.  从 0 到 1 建立公司的技术标准、开发规范及 Code Review 机制，打造极客文化。 与创始人深度配合
2.  主导代码的深度审计、优化与技术债清理，确保系统在快速迭代中的稳定性与安全性。
3.  优化高度可扩展的“任务/剧情引擎”，提升 LBS 触发的精准度与线下交互的极致体验。
4.  负责 AI 智能路径规划算法（基于用户偏好的城市探索逻辑）及 XR（增强现实） 空间交互技术的深度预研与产品化。

【项目介绍】  
我们是一个跨行业、内容驱动的线下体验生态系统。城瘾利用游戏化任务网络，将冰冷的城市街区转化为可互动、可传播的沉浸式游乐场。  
产品逻辑： 一张主题通票，串联起城市内的核心圈层商家。每个主题都有独特的剧情、互动逻辑与游戏玩法，让用户在“刷街”中重拾对城市的瘾力。  
业务势能： 团队已深耕内容侧，累计开发 50+ 城市原创主题，成功链接 100+ 深度合作线下商家。  
当前阶段： 平台原型已完成闭环验证并正式上线。
jobCategory: 全栈开发,客户端开发,算法,AI,项目管理

postTitle: 《从骑行青海到周口下沉市场：带着国家发明专利，找一位想做“雪王级”硬件的技术Partner》【寻远程技术合伙人/核心开发】10w+已落地硬件项目转型：寻找玩转“软硬结合”与“科幻交互”的极客
jobTitle: 远程技术合伙人/核心开发
descContent:
【关于我们】
我们是一家专注于“线下精准流量+生物反馈数据”的创业团队。目前我们的第一代交互设备已在多家大型零售场景（超市/卖场）完成铺设。在完成初步 MVP 验证后，我们发现用户对“纯专业数据”的接受度存在门槛，现正处于生死存亡的 2.0 转型期：全面拥抱“娱乐化仪式感 + 即时奖励”模式。
如果你对“用硬件交互改变线下零售”感兴趣，欢迎加入我们。
【我们需要你解决的挑战】
交互体验重构： 配合我们完成“科幻手感交互”改造。实现手压感应触发、多色 RGB 氛围灯呼吸/流光效控制，将枯燥的检测过程转化为极致的仪式感。
小程序极速化： 优化现有生物阻抗分析算法的反馈逻辑，将长达 60 秒的等待转化为 5-8 秒的“能量扫描”动画，并对接后端抽奖/扭蛋控制系统。
软硬闭环： 实现小程序、服务器与线下硬件（单片机、继电器、传感器）的稳定通信。
【对你的期待】
• 不看学历，看作品： 具备全栈开发能力，且有丰富的 Arduino、ESP32、树莓派等硬件开发经验。
• 产品思维： 能够理解下沉市场用户的心理，不仅能写代码，还能在视觉反馈、音效配合上给出建议。
• 极客精神： 喜欢折腾，能快速出 Demo。如果你自己有 3D 打印机或基础焊接工具则更佳。
【报酬与合作】
• 前期： 采用**“按件/阶段付费”**模式，保护双方初期磨合成本，起步预算 3k-8k（视具体任务而定）。
• 后期： 转型跑通数据后，可转为技术合伙人，提供核心股份及利润分红，共同拓展广阔的线下下沉市场。请附上你的过往作品链接或 Demo 视频，咱们视频聊。
jobCategory: 全栈开发,算法,UI&UX,项目管理

postTitle: CRM Manager
descContent:
**The Role:**

-The role is a full-time website builder using Elementor in Wordpress, building websites for our clients.

**The Person and Skills We Need:**

-Someone who has great English (writing and speaking) preferably without a very very strong accent (don't let your accent worry you, it's not critical, please still apply)

-Someone who can truly become dedicated to Goodjuju and motivated to grow themselves (skills, experience, pay) by helping Goodjuju grow and perform better

-Someone focused who genuinely cares and enjoys their work communicating with the team, clients, and potential clients

-Motivated to grow, make more money (base pay and bonuses), and improve your life while helping improve the life of the Goodjuju team and our clients

**Your Work and Responsibilities:**

✅ Creating designs and concepts for new/existing sites

✅ Collaborating with the other designers, developers, writers

✅ Using our systems and the info/content provided by clients to add to the
website (we will teach you)

✅ Communicating with clients to suggest ideas, ask questions, etc (mostly
email, some calls)

✅ Working at a reasonable pace as not to slow down the process of website
builds

✅ Communicating with the COO and CEO on statuses and workload etc

✅ Providing new ideas/innovation to the COO and CEO

✅ Providing updates on projects to the COO and CEO

✅ Responsive to clients and internal team

\-----

**Full-Time Position and Pay - With Flexible Hours:**

✅ 6.5 hours per day (on average) M-F. We are not super strict on counting
hours, we more expect hustle during your work time and getting things done

✅ We need someone who is excited to help make a difference with their efforts
and be focused solely on Goodjuju. When we grow, you grow.

✅ No 2nd jobs/side hustles. We need your full energy and focus, and you'll be
paid more with the more that you do. You won't need or want a second job :)

**Pay, Bonuses, and Benefits for you:**

_STARTING base pay around**$1,900.00-$2,100.00/month (DOE and Results),** paid
in two payments each month. Multiple opportunities to earn more with good
performance._

_Ability to earn raises at anytime by hustling, going above and beyond, and
doing great work (we will notice this)_

_Do your work**when you want and from where you want (most hours). Flexible
work/life balance.**_

_Low pressure work environment (no finger pointing, negativity, or
micromanaging)_

_A stable, consistent, growing company/team/family that will offer you a safe
job with opportunities to grow, advance, and improve your life_

 _Profit sharing bonuses every quarter (**earn profits like a part owner of
the company**)_

_**Paid Holidays**(US and select Eastern European)_

_**10 paid days off** per year_

 _20 days off unpaid per year_

\-----

There will likely be a paid trial period of 2-4 weeks for us both to get a
feel for each other and make sure it's a good fit mutually.

* * *
jobCategory: 前端开发,UI&UX,运营,项目管理,客户服务

postTitle: Senior Amazon Brand Manager at GNO Partners

Who We’re Looking For:

FBA, enjoys strategizing for brand growth, and can tackle complex challenges
with precision and speed.

Key Skills & Experience:

  * Amazon PPC Expertise: Strategy + execution, proven hands on experience managing minimum $50K+/mo budgets.

postTitle: CEO直招】寻找硬核嵌入式架构师：从 0 到 1 打造对标 Cardo 的骑行智能娱乐系统
descContent:
🎙️ CEO 寄语
“在 Augmax，我们想做的，从来不是对讲机或耳机。
 我们要做的是，让户外运动者“上瘾”的智能娱乐系统。
 如果你有实力，也热爱户外，那就来和我们一起改写这个行业。”

---
🛠️ 项目核心挑战 (The Challenge)
我们正在开发代号为 "Manta Ray" (魔鬼鱼) 的高性能骑行附件。 我们已决定全自研 PCBA，以掌握产品的核心体验。
我们需要你攻克的硬核指标：
1. 高端平台主理：负责 Qualcomm QCC5100 系列 或 BES (恒玄) 2600+ 系列 等中高端平台的底层开发（非杰理/蓝讯等低端方案）。
2. 动态 Mesh 组网：实现稳定、具备自愈能力的 6 人全双工自组网。
3. 双链路无缝切换 (杀手锏功能)：设计一套高可靠性的 BLE 私有协议，与我们的 Flutter 团队深度协同，实现 Mesh 信号弱时毫秒级自动切换至 VoIP 网络通话。
4. 顶级声学降噪：在极窄的物理空间内，利用双麦阵列与高性能 DSP 算法处理高速风噪。
5. 智能安全交互： 负责 IMU (6轴加速度计/陀螺仪) 的数据采集与基础算法实现，支持摔倒检测等安全功能，并与 App 实现联动报警。
我们寻找这样的你
- 技术栈：5 年以上蓝牙音频产品经验，深度精通 Qualcomm ADK 或 BES SDK。
- 关键经验：精通芯片内部音频路由 (Audio Routing) 管理。 未完整量产过 Mesh+VoIP 切换亦可，但需能清晰描述其系统架构、状态机与音频路由策略。
- 协议专家：有开发自定义 BLE 协议并与 Flutter App 团队联调的经验。
- 工程素养：目前 ID 正在最后微调，我们需要你介入共同定义这块性感的 PCBA 堆叠边界。

关于酬劳与周期
- 项目周期：8 个月（含样机产出与量产移交）。
- 劳务报酬：80,000 RMB (分阶段 Milestone 支付)。
- 长期价值：这是一个更接近“技术合伙人”的项目，我们看重长期价值，而不仅仅是一次性交付。
付款节点 (Milestones)：
- M1 (10%)：选型定案、原理图产出及最小系统点亮。
- M2 (30%)：Mesh 协议栈跑通，实现多设备重连及音频切换逻辑演示。
- M3 (40%)：黄金样机交付。配合 ID 结构实现 PCBA 最终版，50km/h 实测合格。
- M4 (20%)：Kickstarter 上线支持及量产资料移交。
📩 如何联系
如果你是那位对硬核硬件充满激情的项目负责人，请私信我你的履历及过往高端平台开发案例。
jobCategory: 客户端开发,算法,项目管理,技术支持

postTitle: 【线上兼职】需要机器学习方向研究生，做数据校对工作
descContent:
我们是一家创业公司，前几年进了YC。目前公司产品需要一些机器学习方向的研究生，帮忙做一些数据校对方面的工作。主要是判断提取自arxiv上的论文数据是否正确。
	
基本工作就是在paper中搜索一下数据，确认下是否跟paper中对应表格里的数据一致，不一致的标注下正确的数据是什么。平均一条数据只需要1-2分钟，比较简单。按照校对量付费。平均时薪大概100人民币每小时。

注意：一定是要机器学习方向的，至少研究生以上的学历，因为需要阅读Arxiv上的英文论文。最好平时也经常阅读Arxiv上的论文，对阅读机器学习方面的论文比较擅长。

另外，我目前是电鸭东北群的群主，我这个公司也是几年前通过电鸭找到的远程。所以绝对靠谱哈。【但注意**不是**电鸭官方招聘哈】如果有的时候回复不及时，也欢迎在东北群ping我哈。
jobCategory: AI,数据分析

postTitle: Marketing Operations Manager (Embedded, DTC & Community)
descContent:
**Location:** Remote (Open to LATAM, Philippines, & other global candidates)

**Engagement:** Contract / Freelance

**Hours:** 30–40 hrs/week (Embedded)

**Compensation:** $2,500–4,000 USD/month (based on experience)

**About TOTYM**

TOTYM is a growing DTC brand blending mythology-inspired plush toys and a
collectible trading card game. The brand combines original IP, lore, physical
products, community, and competitive play. This is not a typical ecommerce
business. Context, consistency, and execution matter.

**About the Role**

We are looking for an **embedded Marketing Operations Manager** who will own
day-to-day marketing execution across channels. This is not a task-based VA
role. You will work closely with the founder, turning strategy into shipped
campaigns, partnerships, ads, and outreach. This role functions as a long-
term, embedded team member rather than a short-term contractor.

You will manage multiple marketing streams at once and help keep everything
moving forward. As the brand grows, this role has the opportunity to take on
broader ownership and responsibility across marketing initiatives.

**What You Will Own**

**Paid advertising**

  * Meta ads (primary, immediate focus)
  * Expansion into YouTube, Reddit, or other platforms over time
  * Campaign setup, strategy development, iteration, and reporting, in close collaboration with the founder

**Game store (B2B) outreach & coordination**

  * Outreach to local game stores
  * Organizing and coordinating tournament opportunities
  * Following up, scheduling calls, and maintaining relationships

**Email marketing (B2C + B2B)**

  * Newsletters, announcements, campaigns
  * Segmentation between consumers and retailers
  * Light performance tracking

**Creator & influencer outreach**

  * Managing affiliate relationships
  * Outreach and follow-ups
  * Organizing campaigns and tracking participation

**Social media execution**

  * Scheduling and posting content
  * Maintaining cadence across platforms
  * Light engagement and replies (secondary)

**SEO for Shopify + AI discovery**

  * SEO improvements for ecommerce
  * Optimization for discovery via AI tools and LLMs
  * Research and implementation of best practices

**Marketing tools & systems research**

  * Evaluating CRM, email, outreach, and marketing tools
  * Making recommendations and assisting with setup

**General marketing execution & ideation**

  * Supporting new initiatives
  * Helping test ideas quickly
  * Keeping momentum across channels

**What Success Looks Like**

  * Paid ads launched and iterating quickly
  * Consistent outreach to game stores and partners
  * Campaigns ship on time without micromanagement
  * Clear visibility into what’s happening across marketing
  * You proactively surface issues and opportunities

**What We’re Looking For**

  * Experience as a **marketing generalist or operator**
  * Comfortable managing multiple channels at once
  * Hands-on experience running Meta ad campaigns (this is a primary responsibility of the role)
  * Strong written and spoken English
  * Organized, proactive, and resilient
  * Comfortable with ambiguity and fast iteration
  * Not instruction-dependent

**Working Model**

  * Embedded role (this should be your primary professional focus, not one of many clients)
  * Async-first communication
  * Some overlap with **U.S. Eastern Time afternoons or evenings/nights**
  * Occasional live calls for planning or coordination
  * Paid trial period required before long-term engagement

**How to Apply**

Please fill out the screening questions at the link below:

https://forms.gle/LDdonNBBT6U71p4m9

* * *
jobCategory: 市场营销,运营,用户增长,内容创作,项目管理

postTitle: 让 AI 像素变成滑手脚下的艺术：寻找一位懂 AI 的全栈大牛，共创滑板定制平台
descContent:
我们是一家深耕滑板行业的公司，前面的九年已经完成了最难的几步：建立品牌形象及极致的供应链整合。 目前我们可以实现单块滑板定制、数码直喷工艺，并做到 7天全球极速交付。我们不想再走“强行推销”的传统老路，我们要用 AI 让每一个滑手、插画师甚至普通小白，都能 0 门槛拥有并销售自己设计的独一无二的滑板。

我们要打造一个 AI 驱动的滑板共创平台：

1.  一键生成： 对接 MJ/SD，让用户通过简单提示词生成大师级板面涂鸦。
    
2.  3D 预览：用户在手机上能 360 度实时查看图案在板面上的效果。
    
3.  闭环系统：用户一键下单生产，同时可授权作品入驻我们的“设计广场”，产生销售后自动结算分成。
    
我们不需要一个只会写代码的螺丝钉，我们需要一位能独立搞定 MVP 的 全栈开发负责人：

 全栈功底： 熟练使用 Node.js 或 Python 搭建后端，前端能搞定微信小程序或 H5。
    
 AI 接口玩家： 深度玩过 Midjourney / Stable Diffusion API，了解如何通过 AI 放大（Upscaling）实现生产级的印刷精度。
    
 3D 视觉：熟悉 Three.js或相关 WebGL 技术（这是让用户“直观感受产品”的核心）。
    
 产品思维：能够理解滑板文化，对 UI/UX 的审美有追求，不接受平庸的界面。
    
 极大的自由度：远程协作，我们看重交付结果，不看重考勤。
    
 丰厚的报酬：根据能力提供竞争力的项目制佣金或全职月薪（25k-40k，具体面议）。
    
 合伙人潜力： 如果 MVP 跑得通，你就是我们的技术创始成员，除了薪资，还有更具想象力的分成或期权。
    
  酷的东西：亲手把 AI 里的虚幻像素，变成大街上滑手脚下真实的滑板。
    
 如果你也觉得“AI + 街头文化”是个性感的生意，请带上你的 作品集/GitHub 链接联系我。
jobCategory: 全栈开发,AI,前端开发,算法,UI&UX

postTitle: 技术合伙人（远程）
descContent:
[岗位福利]  
上班时间灵活自由，支持全球远程办公，无需坐班。  
核心团队激励，通过项目爆发实现长期的财务自由。  
提供出国外派及海外市场拓展机会。  
  
[岗位要求]  
1.5 年以上硬核全栈开发经验，精通微信小程序原生开发及 App (Flutter/React Native) 开发；后端深耕 Node.js / Go /
Python （至少精通其一）。  
2.具备深厚的代码阅读与审美能力。必须是 Cursor / AI Coding 的重度使用者，能够利用 AI 工具实现开发效率的倍增，并能建立 AI
辅助开发的标准流程。  
3.对 LBS （地理位置服务）、高并发实时交互及复杂任务系统有深厚的理解和架构设计经验。  
4.具备优秀的团队管理潜力，能够从 0 到 1 筛选并凝聚一支精干的技术梯队，而非简单的“管人”。  
  
[岗位职责]  
1.从 0 到 1 建立公司的技术标准、开发规范及 Code Review 机制，打造极客文化。 与创始人深度配合  
2.主导代码的深度审计、优化与技术债清理，确保系统在快速迭代中的稳定性与安全性。  
3.优化高度可扩展的“任务/剧情引擎”，提升 LBS 触发的精准度与线下交互的极致体验。  
4.负责 AI 智能路径规划算法（基于用户偏好的城市探索逻辑）及 XR （增强现实） 空间交互技术的深度预研与产品化。  
  
[项目介绍]  
我们是一个跨行业、内容驱动的线下体验生态系统。城瘾利用精密的游戏化任务网络，将冰冷的城市街区转化为可互动、可传播的沉浸式游乐场。  
产品逻辑： 一张主题通票，串联起城市内的核心圈层商家。每个主题都有独特的剧情、互动逻辑与游戏玩法，让用户在“刷街”中重拾对城市的瘾力。  
业务势能： 团队已深耕内容侧，累计开发 50+ 城市原创主题，成功链接 100+ 深度合作线下商家。  
当前阶段： 平台原型已完成闭环验证并正式上线。我们已经拿到了通往未来的门票，正处于全国规模化扩张与技术全面自研的关键拐点。
jobCategory: 全栈开发,客户端开发,算法,AI,项目管理

postTitle: Applied AI Engineer
descContent:
We’re looking for a **Applied AI Engineer** with strong technical skills,
product instincts, and the ability to dive into complex system design. You’ll
be hands-on with multiple early-stage projects across our venture studio,
helping us validate opportunities and bring AI-driven products to life.

### What you’ll do

  * **Build core modules:** Develop and maintain AI-powered features and systems across our in-house venture projects.

  * **Optimize AI systems:** Improve performance through prompt engineering, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), tool design, and scalable agent architectures.

  * **Prototype rapidly:** Validate new product ideas by shipping quick, testable prototypes that inform venture direction.

  * **Engineer evaluation pipelines:** Design automated evaluation systems to measure and improve model and product reliability.

  * **Work full-stack:** Contribute across the stack — from front-end evaluation dashboards and user-facing tools to backend systems (databases, caching, microservices).

  * **Operate in hyperdrive:** Switch contexts across multiple ventures, iterating quickly and collaborating with cross-functional founders and teams.

### **What we’re looking for**

  * Strong programming fundamentals and a bias for clean, high-quality code.

  * Proficiency in Python and familiarity with AI/ML frameworks (e.g. LangChain, Hugging Face, PyTorch, TensorFlow, OpenAI APIs).

  * Solid backend knowledge: databases, caching, message queues, microservices.

  * Comfort with frontend prototyping for internal tools, dashboards, or MVPs.

  * Proven ability to work on zero-to-one products, ideally at startups or studios.

  * Strong written and verbal communication; our team is fully remote.

  * Experience with evaluation pipelines, vector databases, or applied ML in production.

* * *
jobCategory: AI,全栈开发,算法,DevOps/MLOps,后端开发

postTitle: 影视级场景AI陪伴创业项目招牛人一起合作
jobTitle: 高级场景制作岗、IOS高级开发
descContent:
岗位1：高级场景制做岗
1.能制做出影视级2d,3d数字人场景，工具不限。
2.质量要求不需要顶级，相对比较精美即可。
3.能协助前端开发工程师开发。
4.具备一定的美术设计能力和很好的审美理念。
5.必须要有实际案例，无实际案例的勿投。
薪资：月薪暂定15k左右。

岗位1：IOS高级开发
1.有手游类经验，从事IOS开发5年以上
2.深入理解游戏引擎和图形渲染。
3.能与数字场景设计师有效沟通。
5.能独立完成项目，时间充裕。
薪资：根据能力来定，月薪暂定12k左右。

目前因为是创业公司，薪资预算不会太高，能力确实很强的可适当放宽，但随着公司的产品一起成长，公司也不会亏待合作的元老。你能获得了是未来较大的收益增幅，你需要付出的是前期没有太高的资金回报。另外最好人在成都，方便线下沟通。
jobCategory: 客户端开发,AI,设计,前端开发

postTitle: Expert Advisor: Banking/Digital Assets at WebFX
jobTitle: Expert Advisor: Banking/Digital Assets at WebFX
descContent:
Hi there! We're WebFX, a full-funnel revenue marketing agency based in the US.
We've been 10x named a Best Place To Work, and we'd love to meet you! We are a
fast-growing company of more than 700 FXers, that has doubled in size over the
past 5 years, with talented team members in 6 US offices, 20+ states, and now
based around the globe (and representing 18+ different countries!). While
WebFX and our subsidiary companies, such as Nutshell CRM,
[SEO.com](http://SEO.com), and TeamAI, are growing rapidly, we are committed
to growing strategically and sustainably, and that starts with growing our
team of the #BestCoworkers - that’s where you come in!

  

We're looking for people to join our mission to provide world-class full-
funnel revenue marketing solutions to mid-size businesses worldwide. We are
passionate about what we do, we’re committed to driving business growth for
our clients, and we’re on the hunt for people just like you, who take pride in
their work and want to be part of a company that does too.

  

  

**What We're Looking For**

  

Do you have one of these desired skills, licenses or certifications?

  

Do you have one of these desired skills, licenses or certifications?

  

  

Professional Certifications

Banking & Traditional Finance

Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) - Three levels of exams issued by CFA
Institute

Certified Financial Planner (CFP) - Issued by the CFP Board

Financial Risk Manager (FRM) - Issued by the Global Association of Risk
Professionals

Chartered Alternative Investment Analyst (CAIA) - For alternative investments
knowledge

Series 7 (General Securities Representative) - FINRA license

Series 63 (Uniform Securities Agent) - NASAA license

Series 66 (Uniform Combined State Law Examination) - NASAA license

Certified Banking & Credit Analyst (CBCA) - Corporate Finance Institute

Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets

Certified Bitcoin Professional (CBP) - Issued by the Cryptocurrency
Certification Consortium (C4)

Certified Ethereum Expert (CEE) - Blockchain Council

Certified NFT Professional - Blockchain Council

Certified Cryptocurrency Expert - Blockchain Council

Blockchain and Digital Assets Certification - Digital Currency Council

Certified Digital Asset Advisor (CDAA) - Digital Assets Council of Financial
Professionals

Certificate in Tokenization of Securities - Chamber of Digital Commerce

CAMS (Certified Anti-Money Laundering Specialist) - With cryptocurrency module
from ACAMS

  

  

Industry Memberships

Global Digital Finance (GDF) member

Digital Chamber of Commerce participant

American Bankers Association (ABA) member

Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA) member

Crypto Valley Association member

Enterprise Ethereum Alliance participant

  

  

  

**Here’s what else you’ll need for this position:**

  

Flexible scheduling — this position requires 4 hours of remote availability
per week.

Thoughtful written communication practices and a knack for explaining complex
concepts in an accessible manner.

  

Know someone who would be perfect for this opportunity? Send [them this
referral
link](https://jobs.lever.co/webfx/4e23b874-ae29-40df-83a8-010f4d85c00d/apply)!

  

**What You'll Do**

  

Would you like a long-term freelance partnership?

Are you looking for projects you can complete from the comfort of your current
location?

Does the flexibility of setting your own schedule and hours worked per week
sound like a fit for you?

  

**Responsibilities**

  

As an experienced professional in your field, you’ll get to review a variety
of interesting content projects to verify industry accuracy. You will:

Review content for correctness. Is the information in a project true for your
industry?

Identify sections or points in copy that need clarification. Can a concept be
better explained, and how?

Recommend and suggest changes that our top-notch team of writers and editors
can implement within projects. What needs to change, and how, to ensure
content is educational and factually accurate?

  

Conveying factual health information can help people realize they may need a
medical provider. The scientific, health-focused content you’ll review is
meant to be educational — and help people seek out a medical provider who can
assess their potential needs. Alongside these projects, you'll also likely see
content discussing surgical procedures, provider-side concerns, billing,
insurance, medical equipment, biomedical research, technology platforms, and
legal changes and challenges in this field.

  

**Location**

  

This position is fully remote! Work from anywhere as long as you have a great
internet connection and a comfortable workspace.

  

**Time commitment**

  

How much time can you commit per week? We're looking for someone who can
confidently commit to 1-4 hours per week, with ability to expand to up to 10
hours per week based on client growth.

  

Our project management team will align your workload based on your scheduling
availability, which you’ll communicate to us each week. Here’s a review of the
workflow:

Projects should be accepted or declined within 48 hours of receiving them.

After 48 hours with no response, they will be removed from your queue.

If you accept the project, you will have 48 hours from the day of acceptance
to complete your project review.

  

**What You'll Get**

  

**Longevity:** We love working with committed team members! Current team
members in this position have been in the role for over 10 years.

**Competitive Flexible Schedule:** As an independent contractor, you get to
choose your optimal work schedule and have the convenience of working from
home.

**Compensation:** Hourly rates from $50 to $90 per hour. Compensation depends
on certifications, education and work experience.

**Make a Difference:** WebFX strives to not only improve the lives of our
clients and everyone who works for them, but to make a tangible difference on
a global level as well. Through #FXBuilds, our goal is to positively change
the lives of 10,000 people by 2024. Your work will contribute to #FXBuilds by
helping us reach client goals!

  

**Please note: Expert Advisor position openings are based on project demand.
If you do not hear from a recruiter within one month of submitting your
application, the position may have been filled. Please know that your
information is kept on file and you will be the first to be contacted when a
position becomes available!**

  

#LI-Remote

#LI-Remote

**Why Choose WebFX?**

  

\- We've been named the Best Place To Work in our home state of Pennsylvania
10 times

\- We have offices in Guatemala, South Africa, St. Petersburg FL, Ft. Myers
FL, Lancaster, and York, PA! AND we're continuing to grow!

\- Entry-level roles - over 90% of our openings are open to brand new college
grads!

\- Flexible Schedule (start your day between 8 and 10 am - when you do your
best work!)

\- Our #FXBuilds program is set to positively impact 10,000 people around the
world by 2024 - and every individual FXer’s work directly contributes!

\- Love to learn? You sound like an FXer! Earn incentives through
participating in our professional learning and development program.

-Save time and money by skipping the commute to an office - this role allows you to work from the comfort of your home!

\- Merit-based promotions (we promote from within, you will move up and grow
here!)

-The opportunity to be part of a passionate, driven team where we pride ourselves on delivering high-quality work that makes a real-world impact for our clients

  

  

Check out our culture on social media:

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/webfx)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/webfx)

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/webfxinc/)

  

*You don't need to apply more than once even if you're interested in multiple positions - you can simply let us know! We consider all open roles when reviewing resumes and applications!

postTitle: 项目制～高级顾问/合伙人级别：高级系统架构师（硬件+AI+平台方向）
jobTitle: 高级系统架构师（硬件+AI+平台方向）
descContent:
我们是建筑设计和科技结合背景的一个智能家居电子产品初创团队，坐标杭州。创始人是成功创业者，拥有建筑和计算机双领域学术背景，在建筑和互联网领域深耕多年，其中包括成功打造过互联网B2B平台，衔接欧洲尖端设计工作室和中国开发商，承接设计业务总额超亿元。因为在工作中发现的一个新型材料-墨水屏的创新型应用，所以有了这个原型产品的开发计划。我们比较擅长的是产品定义、应用需求和工业设计，以及对软件app开发的基本了解。现需要一位对原型产品（初期类似App连接的蓝牙基站一键快速刷新多张电子墨水屏价签）资深系统架构师，能根据需求，梳理产品硬件开发及软硬件沟通的功能逻辑和交互流程等。

我们正在做什么：

我们致力于打造下一代智能家居解决方案。初期，我们将从一款创新的智能硬件（类似蓝牙基站+多墨水屏电子价签）原型起步，快速迭代验证。中期，我们将为用户注入核心AI能力，实现智能决策与交互。远期，我们的目标是构建一个开放的平台型应用市场，连接开发者与商户，共创生态。

在这里，您将负责：

1. 绘制技术蓝图：基于产品近、中、远期规划，主导设计整个系统的顶层架构，确保其具备高性能、高可用性、可扩展性与安全性。

2. 驾驭全栈技术：从硬件通信、嵌入式软件，到云端微服务、AI中台，再到应用市场的前后端，进行关键技术选型、架构模式设计和资源规划。

3. 驱动产品定义：在初期硬件原型阶段，深度参与产品需求细化，将竞品分析、用户反馈转化为可实施的技术方案和系统设计，输出关键设计文档。

4. 引领技术演进：负责AI功能模块的技术架构，并规划向平台型应用市场平滑演进的技术路径。

5. 保障卓越交付：建立数据驱动的优化流程，通过用户反馈和测试数据，持续推动系统与体验的迭代优化。

我们期待您具备：

• 硬性要求：

  ◦ 5年以上系统架构设计经验，完整主导过至少3个从0到1的项目或重大迭代。

  ◦ 精通Java/Python/Go中至少一门，能进行核心模块的设计评审与代码把关。

  ◦ 精通Axure/墨刀/Figma等工具，能独立输出高质量的产品原型、交互流程及PRD文档。

  ◦ 熟练掌握微服务、分布式、事件驱动等架构模式，有云原生（Docker/K8s/CI/CD）实践经验。

  ◦ 出色的沟通与协调能力，能在跨职能团队和远程协作环境中清晰阐述技术决策。

• 优先考虑：

  ◦ 有C端电商、SaaS或工具类产品成功经验，对用户体验有深刻理解。

  ◦ 具备AI项目实践经验，了解大模型（LLM）应用架构与集成方式。

  ◦ 有智能硬件、物联网（特别是低功耗蓝牙、墨水屏）相关开发或架构经验。

  ◦ 具备良好的审美，能产出简洁美观的高保真原型。

• 核心特质：

  ◦ 逻辑与抽象能力：能快速从混沌的业务需求中提炼出清晰、可扩展的系统模型。

  ◦ 全局与前瞻视野：思考问题不只限于当前功能，更能预见未来3-5年的技术演进与业务扩展。

  ◦ 结果导向与灵活性：适应敏捷、以交付价值为核心的工作节奏。

• 合作方式及项目预算：

合作方式：本次系统架构总包服务费10K-20K（具体可谈）。在后期开发过程中，可按技术顾问方式继续合作，并支付顾问咨询费，并希望成为技术合伙人。

面试方式：线上面试亦可，但更推荐杭州本地线下交流（因为我们将携带零号原型产品方便进行见面交流）。
jobCategory: 后端开发,AI,全栈开发,产品经理,DevOps/MLOps

postTitle: Blog Writer
descContent:
[Buy Shrooms](https://buyshrooms.net/) is one of Canada’s leading online
psilocybin dispensaries, known for delivering lab‑tested magic mushrooms,
microdosing capsules, and infused edibles to adults nationwide. [Buy
Shrooms](https://buyshrooms.net/) is focused on combining scientific
diligence, discreet shipping, and education‑forward content to empower both
first‑time microdosers and seasoned psychonauts on their wellness journeys.

### Role Summary

Own the blog content pipeline—from ideation through publication—crafting
engaging, SEO‑optimized articles that educate readers on psilocybin,
microdosing, and related plant medicines while supporting our e‑commerce
growth goals.

* * *

### Key Responsibilities

  * **Content Creation**

    * Produce 2–4 long‑form articles (1,200–1,800 words) per month that rank for target keywords and drive conversions.

    * Translate peer‑reviewed research and wellness trends into clear, compelling stories that balance scientific accuracy with accessibility.

  * **Editorial Strategy**

    * Pitch topics, create outlines, and maintain a three‑month editorial calendar aligned with marketing campaigns and product launches.

    * Apply on‑page SEO best practices (H‑tag hierarchy, internal links, schema/alt text) to every post.

  * **Collaboration & Repurposing**

    * Coordinate with marketing to adapt blog content into email snippets, social posts, and landing‑page copy.

    * Incorporate feedback from subject‑matter experts (e.g., mycologists, therapists) to enhance authority and compliance.

  * **Performance Tracking**

    * Monitor organic traffic, rankings, and engagement metrics in Google Analytics/Search Console.

    * Iterate on headlines, CTAs, and keyword usage to improve click‑through and dwell time.

* * *

### Must‑Have Qualifications

  * 2–4 years of professional writing experience (wellness, science, or e‑commerce preferred).

  * Demonstrable knowledge of psychedelics, microdosing, or functional‑mushroom niches (published clips required).

  * Proficiency with SEO tools (Ahrefs, SEMrush, SurferSEO, etc.) and CMS platforms such as WordPress or Shopify.

  * Ability to write in a voice that balances evidence‑based rigor with an approachable tone.

  * Familiarity with Canada’s regulatory landscape for controlled substances and willingness to craft compliant copy.

  * Strong self‑management skills: meet deadlines, accept feedback, and revise promptly.

* * *

### Nice‑to‑Have Skills

  * Experience interviewing researchers, clinicians, or wellness practitioners.

  * Basic CRO knowledge for funnel‑friendly copy.

  * Visual‑asset creation skills (Canva, Figma) for simple infographics or hero images.

* * *

### Benefits & Perks

  * **Remote‑first flexibility** with core collaboration hours (9 am – 3 pm PT).

  * Competitive pay structure (per‑article rate, monthly retainer, or prorated salary).

  * Monthly product stipend for personal exploration or content testing.

  * Access to industry conferences, courses, and academic journals for continual learning.

  * Collaborative, feedback‑rich environment that prizes scientific rigor, harm reduction, and creative freedom.

* * *

### How to Apply

Complete the application form at the bottom of this posting. **Email
submissions will not be accepted or reviewed.**

* * *
jobCategory: 内容创作,市场营销,运营
